I am 60 years old and I have severe pelvic/groin pain.  Writing about myself is a first for me.  I am looking for funding to pay for my MRI.
The waiting list for a public MRI  is extremely long, so I am forced to pay for a
private MRI, so the doctor can diagnose me and get me back to work.
With the excruciating pain I am experiencing and unable
to barely walk (I now use a cane), and unable to walk.
With the collected funds, I plan on paying for my MRI.
Any funds collected over what I need, I plan on paying forward,  to personally help others who need MRI care
and can't afford it.

story:
The Most Advanced Smartwatch Available


Features | The Technology | Current Objective | Timeline | FAQ


This is the ultimate in wearable electronic devices.  It is perfect for Fitness, Dieting, General Health, and Entertainment. This is the most feature rich smartwatch with the most cutting edge health sensors that you have been waiting for. It functions as a sleek stylish smartwatch without sacrificing any functionality seen in other devices.  We didn't stop at researching and testing just the next step in wearable devices but the next leap that will change the way we live.  Use it stand alone or pair it with your iPhone or Android smartphone.  Feel safe and secure knowing your vital signs and vital metrics are being monitored by the latest cutting edge technology and will alert you and important emergency contacts if you need assistance and even give them your location if you are unable!  Best of all, there is no painful drawing blood to gain insight into how your body is functioning.

Features | The Technology | Current Objective | Timeline | FAQ

Features

Health

 
  • Continuous Blood Glucose Monitoring
  • Continuous Blood Pressure Monitoring
  • Heart Rate Monitor
  • Oxygenation Level
  • Body Temperature 
  • Calories Burned and Current Burn Rate
  • ECG Waveform 
  • Stress Level
  • Sleep Quality Monitoring
  • Kidney Function

Fitness

 
  • Distance Traveled / tracking 
  • Pedometer
  • Muscle Activation
  • Performance Goals and Alerts 
  • Hydration Level

Interface 

  • Touch Screen Interface
  • Smart Watch Functions (MP3 Control, Text, Email Alerts, etc)
  • Bluetooth LE Connection to Iphone or Android Devices
  • Triggers and Alerts
  • Live Cloud Based Data Tracking
  • Emergency Locator and Medic Alert over Mobile Phone Network
  • High Definition Still and Video Camera
  • Audio Recorder
  • Daylight Visible Ultra-Clarity Display
  • Memory Card Slot 
  • Vibrating and Audible Alerts
  • Android OS
  • Apps and Games


      

    Diabetes affects 25.8 million people in America and 79 million are prediabetic. Currently, the only commonly available and affordable solution for these people are meters that require that they painfully stick themselves each time to draw blood.  Many people who are prediabetic do not even realize it.  

    Our device is not only for those who are concerned about disease but for those who are well and wish to improve their health.  In addition to the large array of biometric sensors and sleek comfortable design, the device will actively alert the wearer to impending blood sugar crashes or spikes allowing them to take action before they affect them.  In the personal trainer mode, it allows the wearer to use custom programs to monitor and set goals for cardiovascular training and maximum effect of physical training along with all of the elements of other health smart watches such as distance traveled, calories burned and pulse all without stopping to take measurements.  All of this data can be tracked in real time online and can alert a third party when a problem is detected.  

    Compatible peripheral devices are also being created for even more functionality such as bicycle cadence, multi-point ECG and muscle performance waveforms are all also in the works. 

    Since it has not received FDA approval, we plan to launch our first device as a health and fitness aid which is not recommended to diagnose or treat illness.

    "Pricking your finger multiple times a day is painful, time consuming, can cause calluses and sensitive fingers, and is difficult if you have visual or dexterity limitations. As a result, negative perceptions about blood glucose monitoring can develop, which can lead to avoidance of monitoring or limited monitoring."
    - Nancy Klobassa Davidson, R.N. and Peggy Moreland, R.N., Mayo Clinic



    This would make the most thoughtful and useful gift for the holidays that you could find.  It will also be the single most advanced piece of technology you can buy in the smartwatch market and is being offered at a huge discount for this campaign only.

    We are also testing sensors for kidney function such as creatinine, urea and lactic acid levels for many other issues and also close monitoring for intensive physical training and EEG add-on.


    Features | The Technology | Current Objective | Timeline | FAQ

    The Technology                                     

    Cutting edge sensors and techniques:  Our device uses non-invasive spectrometric process as well as electrical sampling that has been well published recently but advanced by our engineers to determine Sp02 levels and Glucose using low-cost wavelength specific transmitters and receptors.  Systolic pressure is calculated by comparing an ECG waveform to the spectroscopic waveform using the Pulse Transit Time Method (PTT).  

      



    Features | The Technology | Current Objective | Timeline | FAQ

    Help us complete our production ready prototype and produce marketing material to launch our device and change the lives of millions.

    We are very close to completing our final prototype with only our own investment and blood, sweat and probably more swear words than we would like to admit and now we need your help to cross the finish line.  The funds will also provide assistance creating the marketing material necessary to get our our message out there to let others know to support our project.  This includes creating a video of our device in action and providing more extensive product testing.  

    With your help, a device similar to what we are offering here today will change how we think of diets and training, how we manage diabetes, heart disease, the chronically ill and assist in preventing kidney stones among many other completely new and groundbreaking concepts for wearable devices.


     

    Features | The Technology | Current Objective | Timeline | FAQ







    Features | The Technology | Current Objective | Timeline | FAQ

    Frequently Asked Questions

    Is shipping included? - Yes, shipping to the United States and Canada is included in the price.  Outside the US, please send us an email and we can look more into shipping costs for your area.  A decision will be made on case by case basis.

    When do you plan on making delivery? - We expect to begin shipping the first run of infraV smartwatches to our loyal supporters Q1 2015 (this spring).

    Is the infraV smartwatch hypoallergenic? -  The infraV smartwatch is very hypoallergenic.  The standard model uses medical implant grade titanium as the conductor for the electrical pickup.  The band is made of a comfortable hypoallergenic polymer.   The steel band edition uses 316LVM surgical stainless steel.

    If you don't reach your funding goal, will I still receive my reward?  - Yes, this is our first offering of our device and the funds are intended to prepare a marketing campaign and to complete the production prototype.

    What is the sensor sampling rate?  The final max data rate has not been tested yet but the frequency of the recordings can be adjusted through the interface in case you need to save space.

    Will it fit very large or small wrists? We are working to make sure that we have options for both large and small wrists.  We are comparing going with bands built for a specific size or adjustable size bands.




      

      Other Ways You Can Help

      Please help us by spreading the word and letting everyone know this life-changing technology is now available and that they can help us make it affordable to everyone.  We are looking for people interested in joining with us on this journey to change the way that we use technology.  Please help us let everyone know what we are working on by linking to us on Facebook and social media.










      Legal Information

      * All claims of increasing in value are based on savings when purchasing a first-run smart-watch at regular retail price. This offer is for a coupon and does not represent a cash value.  


      infra-V Technologies is a corporation registered in the state of Florida. Please visit http://sunbiz.org for verification and more information.

      Jurisdiction
      By contributing to our efforts, you understand and agree that we are working from and transacting business in Clearwater, FL and are subject to it's jurisdiction for the purposes of civil and organizational matters. 

      Ownership, Assignment of rights and Responsible Agent
      All contracts and transactions are occurring on behalf of Infra-V Technologies Inc and its agents or members of our Team are working as agents of Infra-V Technologies and are making no personal offers. All trademarks, patents and materials produced in this project are the exclusive property of infra-V Technologies Inc. 

      THE PROJECT'S RESULTS, DEVICE AND TECHNOLOGIES HAVE NOT BEEN EVALUATED BY THE FDA AND AS SUCH, WE, INFRA-V TECHNOLOGIES, ITS STAFF, PARTNERS, TEAM MEMBERS, AND REPRESENTATIVES MAKE NO MEDICAL CLAIMS AND ARE OFFERING NO MEDICAL ADVICE.
      Statements made in this offer and by our agents, partners and representatives have not been evaluated by the FDA and statements should not be construed as medical claims or advice, as such, no device or information that is offered by infra-V Technologies Inc should be used in the diagnosis or treatment of disease. If you suspect that you or a loved one may be at risk of illness, please seek a licensed medical professional for advice before taking any action.

story:
Brian Byrd, founder and owner of St. Louis Fitness and Wellness Group, is a proven fitness and wellness professional of nine years.  Byrd is an expert in personal communication and motivation which results in excellent client retention and overall satisfaction; he stands strong behind the concept of a 360 degree approach to fitness and overall wellness. Along with knowledge and expertise in the fitness and wellness world, Byrd is also a motivational speaker, fitness writer, personal trainer and boot camp instructor.

As new owner of St. Louis Fitness and Wellness Group, Byrd’s dream is to create viable fitness and wellness opportunities for the masses and leave a legacy of health and wellness in his community. He hopes that his community will jump on board with his idea and help him make the community a happier and healthier place.  

Our mission at St. Louis Fitness and Wellness Group is to establish a community environment that promotes fitness, healthy lifestyles, decreases the risk of disease, enhances the quality of life, and increases productivity through healthy lifestyle choices. We encourage families to strengthen their health and well-being through educational opportunities, wellness activities and self-improvement.

We are excited to introduce the STL FITCLUB:

FITCLUB is a membership rewards program designed to increase awareness and involvement in health and fitness services, improve community involvement and support more sustainable living through healthier choices. We want to leave a legacy of a happier and healthier community.

To do this, we are launching a Indiegogo campaign and we encourage and appreciate the support of our community to help us in this task! We are aiming to raise $7,500 in order to create a strategic marketing plan for the FITCLUB to help us in re-launching and raising community awareness for this program.

FITCLUB Budget:  

·  One-year strategic marketing plan for FITCLUB program by Blank Page Marketing Consulting) $4,000

·  Communications Coordination Intern  $1,000

·  Business plan re-write and re-structure $1,500

·  Cost for rewards $500

·  Other $500

Total: $7,500

story:
So as many of you probably already know, Chanon Tuntivate is an unfortunate victim of color blindness, the inability to see certain spectrum of colors because their red and green photopigments have more overlap than normal. By overlap, we mean spectral overlap, which is related to how the photopigments absorb light. 

This company, EnChroma, designed a special set of glasses using the laws of light diffraction and filtering; a method they call multi-notch filtering, which contain one or more sharp “cutouts” in the visible spectrum. To make a lens that helps with red-green color blindness, the notch filtering occurs primarily in the spectral region corresponding to the maximum overlap between the red and green photopigments. Effectively, this drives a kind of wedge between the L-cone and M-cone signals, thus improving the separation of their signals and providing better color vision to the deficient observer. 

Watch this video to see the glasses in action:


Here is the link to the glasses website. It's pretty insane. Could've been a good Product Design idea. The minimum amount you can raise on Indiegogo is $500, so let's get Chanon a pair to wear at the graduation, and pass it on year by year!

The gray lawns will finally be green, and black tassels will turn red. Just in time for graduation. 

http://www.enchroma.com

story:
Rylee Deville has been diagnosed with a congenital heart defect called coarctation of the aorta and will undergo surgery to repair the obstruction in Houston on December 5, 2014. Tara and Josh are going to incur many expenses during Rylee's surgery and recovery, including food, lodging, gas, and medical expenses. Tara just returned to work following an unpaid maternity leave and will be off without pay at least the entire month of December.

Donating money to help them cover their expenses is one of the few ways that friends and family can help them.  Please continue to pray for Rylee, Josh, Tara, Marshall, Dr. William Douglas, and all medical personnel who will be caring for The Deville's.

Tara and Josh are not the type of people to ask for help.  They have reluctantly agreed to accept donations from family and friends who want to help them.  Any money remaining after they start back to work will either be donated to their church or to someone else in need within the community.

story:
On Wednesday December 10th, our big sister/little sister/aunt/best friend Sandy Kinsel lost her second battle with cancer. I know a lot of us are reeling from the loss and dealing with our sadness over losing such a bright light and someone who always wanted us to just live the way we want to live. 

Unfortunately in the midst of grief and loss, there are financial burdens that come along as well. There are costs to provide a visitation, an evening where we can all come together and celebrate Sandy's life and what she meant to all of us. 

There are also medical bills for Sandy's treatments that still must be paid. 

Let's help David out with this part of the burden. Any tiny contribution helps out, whatever you can give is fine. And if you can't give, it doesn't matter, words of encouragement help more than you know during this time.

Visitation Information - December 16th from 6-8pm at Andrew's Mortuary on Market Street in Wilmington, NC.
https://www.facebook.com/events/314078465469304/

story:
In 2013 I was diagnosed with Grade 3 Breast Cancer. After my double mastectomy and reconstruction, I found that my body would no longer allow me to use my 4 year old yoga practice that my body, mind and emotional state seemed hungry for to heal.

Although there are many wonderful yoga teachers in Brighton and the UK, I have felt mis-understood and frustrated in my expression. I cannot move my arms or chest muscles as I use to, its painful. It's like how do you know a tomato if you have never tasted one and it is the same for having cancer or loosing your natural breasts.

In the UK we seem to be so far behind in the treatment and support of cancer and yet it effects so many lives today.

I found a drive building in me to support others in my position. To be truly able to meet them where they are at with empathy and love. To help them feel comfortable again in their skin and find again that sense of "womanly-ness."

After much research I have found the teaching course that will enable me to learn my "new body" and move comfortably ~ and in turn know from a place of truth and experience how to help others.

The course is in Italy. It starts this Sunday the 19th of April. It costs £920 for the certification and accommodation/meals. And I need my flight fare also to make this goal in my heart my reality.

I am a single mother of 4, so this kind of money is not easily accessible to me.

I ask from an open heart that you please help me to make a difference to the patients and survivors of Breast Cancer.

Thank you for reading.

Warm wishes

Michelle x

story:
The Undress is NOT a regular dress.  It has over 10 proprietary and patented features that make it function like no other dress in the world.

If you workout, then you know the PAIN OF CHANGING OUTFITS OUTDOORS!

We wanted to create a product that would empower women to be active, and support their active lifestyles. Woman regularly change clothes in the wildest of places - fighting sports bras, sticky leggings, and wet shirts - forcing millions of us to change in cars, nasty restrooms, and towel changing in public, just so we can enjoy the activities we love. This is a real problem MILLIONS of women share!

With its patented features, you can change into, or out of in as little as 30 seconds. No privacy needed - and it even works to remove sports bras.

HOW TO UNDRESS

How it works is simple - You can quickly change INTO OR OUT OF ANY OUTFIT, USING THE UNDRESS.

  •  How to Remove Your Top: First, bring The Undress to your waist. Then use the soft handle to guide the front of the dress underneath anything you want to remove. Bring the straps over your head, and cinch both the neck and back cord locks to secure. Finally, simply remove your top and bra.
     
  •  How to Remove Your Bottoms: Insert your hands into the side access openings to easily remove your bottoms. 

You're now in the dress!

Change into another outfit, such as your running clothes, by reversing the process.

  •  Put on your clothes over the Undress: Put your bra and top over The Undress, and use the special side openings to put on your bottoms.
     
  •  Slip Out: Next, simply loosen the cord locks and use the soft handle to guide the straps under all your top layers.  Then just slip out of The Undress, and you’ll be in your new outfit!

DONE!

 

  •  TRAVEL - Travel dress, especially in hostels - you can even change in trains and planes. Wear it multiple ways for any destination!
  •  STUDIO - In a studio, when there are no changing rooms or bathroom lines are too long.
  •  WATER - The Undress is perfect for beach and swim sports. Do deck changes securely or change right on the beach without ever leaving your spot.
  •  MUD RUNS & OBSTACLE RACES - After Mud runs, when you don’t want to change in your car.
  • OUTDOORS - Light enough to take hiking and camping. Especially helpful if you’re sharing a tent!
  • TEAM SPORTS - For Sports Teams - both on and off the field, especially if you're surrounded by spectators. Show up in The Undress and change on the spot if needed!
  • LOCKER ROOMS + YOUTH - It’s perfect for students who must change in school locker rooms.
  • PHOTOGRAPHERS AND VIDEO - Models & Actresses can change anywhere during shoots, saving valuable time!
  • EVERYDAY WEAR - EVERYDAY WEAR - It’s beautiful and comfortable so you will want to wear it like your other favorite dress!

REAL TESTIMONIALS:

  • "I love how easy it is to use this dress to change after a race!"
  • "I am a surfer and I can change quickly at the beach without having to try and hide behind a towel or sit in my car. I love how easy it is to use."
  • "I love how comfortable it is!! And it's perfect for beach weather and traveling!!"
  • "I work out regularly, whether it's swim, bike, or run. And I sweat a lot. Therefore, I like to be able to get out of my sweaty clothes before driving home. I also like to change out of my team kit after a triathlon. It is nice to be in dry clothing while hanging out with friends after a race...well, once we get to race again!"
  • "The undress - all versions I currently still own (SIL's, sister, and girlfriends keep complimenting them and they find their way to their closets :D) are my go-to uniform for travelling in, work, and hiking/sports to change into and out of when finished with my activity. International travel (when that last happened in the summertime) saw all of my wardrobe fit into my carryon backpack due to the undress and the scarves I also bought from Undress. And honestly, the zip hoodie, undercover, and t-shirts finished off my all my packing needs."
  • "I kayak, canyoneer, climb, hike, etc and after a long hot day I usually end up just staying in the dress after changing. It's comfortable and cute!"

 

 

  • Custom Designs - For the first time ever, we will design our own Prints! These prints are going to be customized, and will be inspired by the prototypes you see above.  We'er going to take what you see to the next level!

 CURRENT TOP COLORS BASED ON BACKER VOTES:

  • Black
  • Forest Blue
  • Santini Skies
  • Kat Nip Navy
  • Hi Hi Hibiscus
  • Hello Hawaii
  • La La Rhianna
  • Kuu Bluu
  • Kolors Like Kiara
  • Sydney Starlight

Sizing is simple since it is multi-adjustable for that perfect custom fit. With the new Button + Elastic System. Set it once, and forget it.

If you are less that 5 feet tall, and of average weight, Size A is your best bet.

The length has 10 inches of adjustment!

Your color, size, and shipping address will be requested AFTER the campaign is over and is successful (after Dec 15).

If you don’t love The Undress, please let us know - we will take care of you!

We take our customer service seriously, and want to make sure you are happy.

 

Yes, this dress even LOOKS different!  (Dare we say better?!(  This dress is more modern, and is arguably the prettiest dress of all versions!

Yes, you read that right. The most versatile dress in the world, just got more versatile!  Simply pull on the side straps and tie it up to the perfect length. Great for beaches, sand, or just kickin’ it at home.

At full length, the dress is approximately 49 inches from the "plunge" of the neckline on the current prototype (keep in mind it may change slightly in actual production, but is should be close)

When shortened, it can get as short as 39 inches from the "plunge", giving the dress 10 inches of adjustment!

Due to popular demand, we brought back the lay-flat pockets with zippers, that have larger pocket capacity! Placement is higher up on the dress for better accessibility!

NEW! You can now wear The Undress with a new nifty Double Strap feature (not just a halter!)  Wow, even more versatility!

We have brand new fabric which is lightweight, breathable and comfortable.  For the first time ever, we are producing our OWN fabric designs (based closely on what is shown) to improve fabric availability.  When you pre-order, you also VOTE for the top designs that we will make.  If we get enough pre-orders, we will make ALL the styles available!

We will be using the SAME factory that was used for The Undercover V2 that was DELIVERED 1 MONTH EARLY for Backers.  This is the BEST factory we have ever used, and we are confident that this factory will deliver the Undress V5, with quality and on time.

It’s a matching, lightweight belt that you can attach to the dress (so you don’t lose it) or keep it separate!  Wear it to the front, or tie it in the back for a different look.  Also, with the back-center rear loop, you can attach the belt so you don’t lose it!

It’s even easier to self-pack The Undress V5!
 

 

We created a versatile Undress Headband x Mask as a convenient and functional way to add some style to your outfit!  Made with the same fabric as the dress, you can wear it in multiple ways, and even as a small neck scarf!

There is also a small pocket to insert a small mask filter, if you want!

*Non-Medical.  Prototype shown, and subject to change

It’s a matching, lightweight belt that you can attach to the dress (so you don’t lose it) or keep it separate!  Use the 3 belt loops in multiple ways to get different styles - fitted, belted, and gathered.

Although The Undress Version 5 is not yet in production, we are here on Indiegogo so YOU can help make it a reality.

Our team and factories are ready, and now all we need is you to make this real. Please choose a pledge level that works best for you, and join our community that believes EVERY woman deserves the comfort and security that The Undress brings.

Please pledge, please share. Just say YES to The Undress, and become an Agent of Change. Thank you!

Hi There!

We are April and Dennis and we are so grateful that you took the time to review our campaign for The Undress Version 5! Thank you! We have spent over a year developing this brand new version with the help of our previous backers and customers (that we lovingly refer to as The Undress Family! ) and we are so happy with the result! We are so thankful for our incredible community of women and men who have been by our side through all the ups and downs in this crazy adventure. If you have supported us in the past in any way, or have supported us now, thank you so much from the bottom of our hearts. We would not exist as a company AT ALL without you! Thank you for helping us make our dreams into reality!

We really hope you love The Undress Version 5! We feel this is the most elegant and graceful version of The Undress that we have ever made and we absolutely love it! We’re also excited about all the new features (especially the adjustable length!) and the fact that we will finally be making custom fabrics for the first time, which is a big dream come true for us. A huge thank you to all our previous backers for helping us create this new version with us! That’s why we love crowdfunding—it’s a platform that allows this kind of unique, personal connection between us and our amazing backers. That’s why we continue to come back again & again and also encourage others to use it as a way to launch their own dreams and ideas.

If you choose to back our campaign today, you’ll help our little company make big changes like expand our distribution & wholesale programs, develop new sales channels and continue to grow our brand on the global scale. We have been blessed with this amazing opportunity and we can’t do it without you! We invite you to join our tens of thousands of backers from all around the globe who are helping us make big changes in the world—one dress at a time. Please pledge, please share and become the first in the world to own The Undress Version 5 and join The Undress Family!

Thank You,

April & Dennis

———

Thank You

 

Since we started in 2014, we have had over 6 successful Campaigns and delivered EVERY SINGLE ORDER. We have taken care of customers to satisfaction, and have a guarantee. We have delivered over 25,000 dresses, and that number continues to grow everyday!

 

*VAT, Duties, Taxes are not included. All products are prototypes and subject to change -  features, colors, prints, sizing.  Free Gift has no cash value, and is only available at no cost for previous backers of The Undress V1, V2, V3, V4 and Undercover V1, V2 - and recipients may be required to prove they qualify.

** If the reward level you choose does not include FREE shipping, you will be charged when you finalize your order via Backerkit Order Survey (this arrives via email 12 days after you pledge here on Indiegogo)

 

SPECIAL THANKS AND CREDITS

Founders - Dennis Caco & April Estrada

Internal Team & Production Crew: : Marat Zabelinskiy, Nestor P., Mark A, Ricardo, Richard, Clio K., Raquel, Stephany

VIP Crew: Mr. Money Bags - Ben A., MiMi an Mark, Padres Numero Uno - Margerita and Jerry Estrada, Marat Zabelinskiy

Models: April, Stacy, Rihanna, Kiara, Sydney, Kilsis, Nat, Jen, Kat, Kuu

Test Fitters: Evelyn Sun, Nikki Motosian, Monique Ramos, Stephany, Lily, and we hope we didn't miss anyone! :)

THANK YOU SO MUCH to our amazing team and everyone who helped to support us in creating The Undress Version 5 Campaign. We are so grateful for your time, energy, talent, encouragement, guidance and for helping us create this dream into reality. We will forever be grateful and appreciative to all of you for being there for us!

Dennis Caco:  Special thank you to my family - wife Rachelle, and two awesome sons Drake and Ronin, as well as my mom.  Thank you to our entire team for everything they have put into this project, it could not be done without you.

April Estrada: I want to send a HUGE THANK YOU to everyone who helped make this campaign and new launch a reality! Thank you to our incredible Undress team and everyone who provided their time, care, hard work and effort to help The Undress Version project come together! And an especially huge thank you to Dennis for being our captain and holding us afloat through the difficult times. I appreciate all the immense work and effort you’ve put in to help keep us going and keep our dream alive. You are the Number 1 Agent of Change! I’m grateful for having you by my side for all the bad and the good! 

Also another HUGE THANK YOU to my parents, Margarita and Jerry, for their incredible generosity and support of our business. I appreciate you both so much for always being there for me! And thank you to my sister Stephanie—I appreciate your feedback and for helping me remember to take care of myself! 

You guys are DA BEST! 

And thanks so much to all my friends and PSI family for your love and support as well! Ya’ll have definitely helped me get through both the great and hard times  and also remind me that I am more powerful and capable than I give myself credit for! I’m so grateful for you! THANK YOU!
story_txt:
The Undress is NOT a regular dress.  It has over 10 proprietary and patented features that make it function like no other dress in the world.If you workout, then you know the PAIN OF CHANGING OUTFITS OUTDOORS!We wanted to create a product that would empower women to be active, and support their active lifestyles. Woman regularly change clothes in the wildest of places - fighting sports bras, sticky leggings, and wet shirts - forcing millions of us to change in cars, nasty restrooms, and towel changing in public, just so we can enjoy the activities we love. This is a real problem MILLIONS of women share!With its patented features, you can change into, or out of in as little as 30 seconds. No privacy needed - and it even works to remove sports bras.
 HOW TO UNDRESSHow it works is simple - You can quickly change INTO OR OUT OF ANY OUTFIT, USING THE UNDRESS.

 How to Remove Your Top: First, bring The Undress to your waist. Then use the soft handle to guide the front of the dress underneath anything you want to remove. Bring the straps over your head, and cinch both the neck and back cord locks to secure. Finally, simply remove your top and bra. 

 How to Remove Your Bottoms: Insert your hands into the side access openings to easily remove your bottoms. 
You're now in the dress!

HOW TO RE-DRESS
Change into another outfit, such as your running clothes, by reversing the process.

 Put on your clothes over the Undress: Put your bra and top over The Undress, and use the special side openings to put on your bottoms. 

 Slip Out: Next, simply loosen the cord locks and use the soft handle to guide the straps under all your top layers.  Then just slip out of The Undress, and you’ll be in your new outfit!
DONE!
 
 

 TRAVEL - Travel dress, especially in hostels - you can even change in trains and planes. Wear it multiple ways for any destination!
 STUDIO - In a studio, when there are no changing rooms or bathroom lines are too long.
 WATER - The Undress is perfect for beach and swim sports. Do deck changes securely or change right on the beach without ever leaving your spot.

 MUD RUNS & OBSTACLE RACES - After Mud runs, when you don’t want to change in your car.

OUTDOORS - Light enough to take hiking and camping. Especially helpful if you’re sharing a tent!

TEAM SPORTS - For Sports Teams - both on and off the field, especially if you're surrounded by spectators. Show up in The Undress and change on the spot if needed!

LOCKER ROOMS + YOUTH - It’s perfect for students who must change in school locker rooms.

PHOTOGRAPHERS AND VIDEO - Models & Actresses can change anywhere during shoots, saving valuable time!

EVERYDAY WEAR - EVERYDAY WEAR - It’s beautiful and comfortable so you will want to wear it like your other favorite dress!

I also like to change out of my team kit after a triathlon. It is nice to be in dry clothing while hanging out with friends after a race...well, once we get to race again!"
"The undress - all versions I currently still own (SIL's, sister, and girlfriends keep complimenting them and they find their way to their closets :D) are my go-to uniform for travelling in, work, and hiking/sports to change into and out of when finished with my activity. International travel (when that last happened in the summertime) saw all of my wardrobe fit into my carryon backpack due to the undress and the scarves I also bought from Undress. And honestly, the zip hoodie, undercover, and t-shirts finished off my all my packing needs."
"I kayak, canyoneer, climb, hike, etc and after a long hot day I usually end up just staying in the dress after changing. It's comfortable and cute!"

story:
We make the only bullet, strike and slash resistant vests on the market!  Starting at only $299 our high quality concealable vests are incredibly affordable.  With full side protection our vests offer 15% more coverage than our competitors!  Sizing is available from S-XXXL to fit nearly all body types.  For those who simply cannot afford the protection they need, we provide our armor at no cost through The Safe Life Defense Guardian Angel Program.



A VEST FOR EVERYONE

Body armor is legal for anyone with a clean criminal record in all 50 states.


SAFE LIFE DEFENSE MULTI-THREAT PROTECTION ENSURES UNPARALLELED PERFORMANCE 



BULLET RESISTANT - Our NIJ rated body armor meets the threat resistance standards used by Law Enforcement and the National Institute of Justice. Our level iiia armor will protect you against all common handgun rounds up to .44 magnum and even shotgun and submachine gun rounds.



RIFLE PROTECTION - When using optional hard plates in conjunction with a Safe Life Defense vest, you will be protected against rifle threats up to 30-06. 


STRIKE RESISTANT- Safe Life Defense defends against general blunt force trauma such as punches, car crashes, motorcycle accidents, falls and of course, weapons such as baseball bats.


SLASH RESISTANT - Our ballistic panels, composed of custom Kevlar, protect you against bladed weapons.


The SAFE LIFE DEFENSE Difference : INNOVATIVE FEATURES AND THOUGHTFUL DESIGN 




 

CUSTOM DUPONT® KEVLAR – We manufacture our own Kevlar sheets from threads of DuPont® Kevlar, the most trusted name in ballistics. This unique material is responsible for making our vest strike resistant and affordable.



15% MORE COVERAGE – Added side protection ensures a heightened degree of safety. Safe Life Defense armor provides 15% more coverage than competitors.


ULTRA CONCEALABLE – Your vest will remain hidden under a shirt or light jacket, even with our Level IV Rifle Plate.


10 POINT ADJUSTABLE – Our body armor will comfortably fit nearly all body types. Safe Life Defense armor includes 4 main comfort straps which are independently adjustable and two adjustable shoulder straps to ensures a proper fit.




THE GUARDIAN ANGEL PROGRAM: DONATIONS TO CIVILIANS & LAW ENFORCEMENT

The Guardian Angel Program donates our high quality body armor to people in vital need of protection. We believe that no matter what, safety is what allows freedom in everyday life. For every $400 collectively pledged we promise to donate a vest to someone in need. In addition to these donations Safe Life Defense will always provide at least one vest a month. Pledging even a dollar makes a difference! Help save lives with Safe Life Defense and The Guardian Angel Program. 

Meet Phillip Taylor, Flight Medic: THE FIRST RECIPIENT OF THE GUARDIAN ANGEL PROGRAM



Phillip Taylor is a flight medic, a future graduate of the police academy, and a proud husband and father of three. Phillip represents the countless men and women in America who need body armor, not only to perform their job, but to return home to their loved ones. Make a difference for someone like Phillip Taylor and make a pledge today! Every dollar counts.

GET INVOLVED AND MAKE A DIFFERENCE WITH SAFE LIFE DEFENSE: THE FINAL STEPS

We have spent countless hours perfecting our superior body armor design. Our prototypes have been finalized and our armor has passed testing. So what's next? We need your help to mass produce our armor and start saving lives!

BACKER REWARDS




GRATEFUL FOR OUR GUARDIANS: THANKS FROM THE PRESIDENT OF SAFE LIFE DEFENSE

I knew that, with your help, I could not only start a solid defense company, but I could get our vests to people who need them the most –men and women who face compromising situations every day. The conversations I have with these people prove to me that this is what I am meant to do.

I hope you continue to follow me in this journey. It has been humbling and inspiring to discover that my life passions – personal protection and entrepreneurism – can be altruistic. I know that we can make in a difference in so many lives by providing body armor to people in need.

I cannot thank you enough for your support. I am excited and inspired every time I think about the future recipients of The Guardian Angel program. With your help and support, it is now possible. Thank you for being someone’s guardian angel and for making a difference.

Thank you backers!  I sincerely appreciate your support,

Nick Groat


GUARANTEES


5 Year Warranty: All Safe Life Defense armor carries a 5 year warranty on all ballistic panels and plates.

Incident Guarantee: In the event your armor protects you from a firearm threat we will replace your armor at no cost.  Simply send us your armor accompanied by a police report and we will take care of the rest.

Fit & Satisfaction Guarantee: We guarantee you will be satisfied with your Safe Life Defense armor.  We are happy to exchange or return your vest within 30 days of purchase.

THE NUMBERS: BALLISTIC TESTING



Risks and Challenges

Safe Life Defense body armor is proudly NIJ rated, but we wish to enhance our credentials. The National Institute of Justice offers a voluntary testing program to become NIJ compliant. Exceptional success of our Indiegogo will allow us to submit the large number of armor samples needed for testing.

Phillip Taylor is a flight medic, a future graduate of the police academy, and a proud husband and father of three. Phillip represents the countless men and women in America who need body armor, not only to perform their job, but to return home to their loved ones. Make a difference for someone like Phillip Taylor and make a pledge today! Every dollar counts.
GET INVOLVED AND MAKE A DIFFERENCE WITH SAFE LIFE DEFENSE: THE FINAL STEPS
We have spent countless hours perfecting our superior body armor design. Our prototypes have been finalized and our armor has passed testing. So what's next? We need your help to mass produce our armor and start saving lives!
BACKER REWARDS






GRATEFUL FOR OUR GUARDIANS: THANKS FROM THE PRESIDENT OF SAFE LIFE DEFENSE
I knew that, with your help, I could not only start a solid defense company, but I could get our vests to people who need them the most –men and women who face compromising situations every day. The conversations I have with these people prove to me that this is what I am meant to do.
I hope you continue to follow me in this journey. It has been humbling and inspiring to discover that my life passions – personal protection and entrepreneurism – can be altruistic. I know that we can make in a difference in so many lives by providing body armor to people in need.
I cannot thank you enough for your support. I am excited and inspired every time I think about the future recipients of The Guardian Angel program. With your help and support, it is now possible. Thank you for being someone’s guardian angel and for making a difference.
Thank you backers!  I sincerely appreciate your support,
Nick Groat

GUARANTEES

5 Year Warranty: All Safe Life Defense armor carries a 5 year warranty on all ballistic panels and plates.
Incident Guarantee: In the event your armor protects you from a firearm threat we will replace your armor at no cost.  Simply send us your armor accompanied by a police report and we will take care of the rest.
Fit & Satisfaction Guarantee: We guarantee you will be satisfied with your Safe Life Defense armor.  We are happy to exchange or return your vest within 30 days of purchase.

THE NUMBERS: BALLISTIC TESTING










Risks and Challenges
Safe Life Defense body armor is proudly NIJ rated, but we wish to enhance our credentials. The National Institute of Justice offers a voluntary testing program to become NIJ compliant. Exceptional success of our Indiegogo will allow us to submit the large number of armor samples needed for testing.

story:
Stop feeling tired!

 

Stimulate your brain with HumanCharger®

 

After more than 90,000 devices sold, we are upgrading our successful HumanCharger® Classic with Bluetooth capability, Integrated Sound and Microphone.

With the new HumanCharger® Wireless Headset you can get the benefits of the sunlight at the same time when

 

      ☎️  Talk on the phone or

      ▶️  Listen your favorite audio content

 

Benefits :

      ✅  Increased energy levels

      ✅  Improved mood

      ✅  Reduced effects of jet lag

      ✅  Increased mental alertness

      ✅  Fixed winter blues

 

     

    Features - Audio:

    • State-of-the-art Qualcomm® Bluetooth® 5 aptX™ HD audio platform
    • SBC and AAC audio codec
    • Built-in microphone
    • iPhone and Android compatible
    • USB Type-C connection for charging

     

    Features - Light:

    ☀️  Duration of light session: 12 mins

    ☀️  Average light intensity: > 10,000 lux (1 cm) / > 3.5 lumen

    ☀️  10 light sessions or 16 hrs of music on one charge

     

     

    Rick Rubin, Music producer, tells about HumanCharger in Tim Ferriss' book Tribe of Mentors:


    “…HumanCharger can also be used for other things like meditation, or if you have to be alert for a meeting, appointment or training session, you can wear it on the way.”

     

    Aubrey Marcus, Founder and CEO of Onnit, uses HumanCharger in the mornings.

     

    Nick Littlehales, Sport sleep coach, writes that HumanCharger helps in jet-lag.

     

     

    A London based HumanCharger user shared his experience with the device.


    "I use it in a daily basis during the winter when it’s not a lot of light here in London"

    "...It's been a life-changer in terms of my travels!"

    See the whole testimonial video here:

     

     

    Check the video below to see a demonstration of HumanCharger® Wireless Headset easy to use basic operations.

     

     

    HumanCharger® users say it best:

     

    "...I am very thankful for your product!" - D.P. (Indiana, US)

    "...HumanCharger worked wonders for me." - Jan (Europe)

    "...is very useful with our shortening days." - J.S. (Alaska, US)


    They are stay-at-home parents, time-zone-crossing professionals, hard working students, competing athletes, night-shift workers, office heroes.... and all perform better with HumanCharger®.

    Here are some awesome testimonials we have received during last years:

     

    After more than 90,000 devices sold, we are upgrading our successful HumanCharger® Classic with Bluetooth/Wireless capability with Integrated Sound and Microphone.

    The new device is called HumanCharger® Wireless Headset  - US Patent 9,258,642.

    • Increase energy levels
    • Improve mood
    • Reduce effects of jet lag
    • Increase mental alertness
    • Fix winter blues

     

     

    Sunlight is the source for a significant portion of our daily health. Not enough sunlight and our body and mind suffer the consequences. HumanCharger® provides a supplement to the nourishing rays of sun exactly when you need it.

    HumanCharger® gives you a boost of energy, improves mood and increases mental alertness. It is a perfect defense against the blues.

     

    HumanCharger® alleviates the symptoms of jet lag by 50%. How would your time-zone crossing travel experience improve if you are back in business that much faster?

    HumanCharger® keeps your body and mind in sync from destination to destination. Forget the brain fog and get back on track fast.

     

    HumanCharger® integrates into your daily rhythm, workout regimen or while you work. Raise your work performance, jump-start your mind with the power of light and feel recharged all day.

     

     

    Our company was founded in 2007.  Our first commercial light therapy device came into market in 2010. The second generation device with the improved usability was introduced in 2011.

    In 2013 we launched the third generation device. For this device, we improved design and ergonomics, and this device won the Red Dot Design Award in 2014.

    People around the world have recognized the HumanCharger® as an innovative and unique solution for their well-being. Now we've made it even better! One of the most frequently asked questions about the HumanCharger® has been "Does it play music?" Finally we can answer "Yes it does!"

    Now, in 2019, we can proudly present the brand new model:

     

    HumanCharger® Wireless Headset

     

     

    With a compact, ergonomic and stylish design, HumanCharger® Wireless Headset is the bright light device you can carry with you and use whenever, wherever.

    Flexible neckband and adjustable cords are designed to provide lasting comfort.

     

    Wear the HumanCharger® Wireless Headset behind your neck. Insert earbuds snugly in to your ears. Control the device with the set of easy to use buttons on the right side of the neckband.

    Use Bluetooth to connect the HumanCharger® Wireless Headset to your preferred audio source or phone.

     

    The earbuds are designed to be the most comfortable on the market, and fit perfectly in a variety of ear shapes.

     

     

    • HumanCharger® Wireless Headset
    • Charging cable
    • Set of earbud fittings
    • Quick guide

     

    Our return policy: 30 day money back guarantee, no questions asked.

    This means that if you are not happy with the device (for whatever the reason), you can send it back to us within 30 days after receiving it, and we will refund you as soon as we get the device back.

     

    Between 2008-2010, researchers at the University of Oulu, Finland, discovered that in addition to eyes, areas of the human brain are also sensitive to light. This sensitivity is due to the photoreceptor-proteins in the brain, which are similar to those found in the eyes, a discovery that had been made by researchers in the U.K. and the U.S. 10 years earlier.

    University of Oulu researchers found that brain areas can be reached by light through ear canals, ear tissues and bones of skull. The skull of large mammals, including humans, lets light pass through naturally. In normal daylight and daytime conditions the brain is constantly being exposed to light.

    Here are links to relevant published, peer-reviewed findings and doctoral dissertations:

    •  Effects of transcranial light on molecules regulating circadian rhythm (Doctoral Dissertation, Flyktman 2018)
      • Link: http://urn.fi/urn:isbn:9789526219592
    •  Transcranial bright light : the effect on human psychophysiology (Doctoral Dissertation, Jurvelin 2018)
      • Link: http://urn.fi/urn:isbn:9789526218113
    •  The distribution of melanopsin (OPN4) protein in the human brain (Nissilä et al. 2017)
      • Link: http://www.tandfonline.com/doi/figure/10.1080/07420528.2016.1232269?scroll=top&needAccess=true
    • Transcranial light alters melanopsin and monoamine production in mouse (Mus musculus) brain (Flyktman et al. 2017)
      • PDF: http://www.neurores.org/index.php/neurores/article/view/427/426
    •  Human brain reacts to transcranial extraocular light (Sun et al. 2016)
      • PDF: https://humancharger.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/Human-brain-reacts-to-transcranial-extraocular-light.pdf
    •  Transcranial bright light and symptoms of jet lag: a randomized, placebo-controlled trial (Jurvelin et al. 2015)
      • PDF: https://humancharger.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/Transcranial-bright-light-and-symptoms-of-jet-lag_a-randomized-place-controlled-trial.pdf
    •  Transcranial light affects plasma monoamine levels and expression of brain encephalopsin in the mouse (Flyktman et al. 2015)
      • PDF: https://humancharger.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/Transcranial-light-affects-plasma-monoamine-levels-and-expression-of-brain-encephalopsin-in-the-mouse.pdf
    •  Effects of bright light treatment on psychomotor speed in athletes (Tulppo et al. 2014)
      • PDF: https://humancharger.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/Effects-of-bright-light-treatment-on-psychomotor-speed-in-athletes..pdf
    •  Transcranial bright light exposure via ear canals does not suppress nocturnal melatonin in healthy adults –a single-blind, sham-controlled, crossover trial (Jurvelin et al. 2014)
      • PDF: http://www.tandfonline.com/doi/abs/10.3109/07420528.2014.916297
    •  Altered resting-state activity in seasonal affective disorder (Abou-Elseoud et al. 2014)
      • PDF: https://humancharger.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/Altered-resting-state-activity-in-seasonal-affective-disorder..pdf
    •  Transcranial bright light treatment via ear canals in seasonal affective disorder: a randomized controlled double-blind dose-response study (Jurvelin et al. 2014)
      • PDF: https://humancharger.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/Transcranial-bright-light-treatment-via-ear-canals-in-SAD-a-randomized-controlled-double-blind-dose-response-study.pdf
    •  Stimulating brain tissue with bright light alters functional connectivity in brain at the resting state (Starck et al. 2012)
      • PDF: https://humancharger.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/Stimulating-brain-tissue-with-bright-light-alters-functional-connectivity-in-brain-at-the-resting-state.pdf
    •  Can transcranial brain-targeted bright light treatment via ear canals be effective in relieving symptoms in seasonal affective disorder? A pilot study (Timonen et al. 2012)
      • PDF: https://humancharger.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/Can-transcranial-brain-targeted-bright-light-treatment-via-ear-canals-be-effective-in-relieving-symptoms-in-seasonal-affective-disorder-A-pilot-study.pdf
    •  Encephalopsin (OPN3) protein abundance in the adult mouse brain (Nissilä et al. 2012)
      • PDF: https://humancharger.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/Encephalopsin-OPN3-protein-abundance-in-the-adult-mouse-brain.pdf
    •  Group-ICA model order highlights patterns of functional brain connectivity (Abou-Elseoud et al. 2011)
      • PDF: https://humancharger.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/Group-ICA-model-order-highlights-patterns-of-functional-brain-connectivity..pdf

     

     

    Here are more great reviews from HumanCharger® users:

     

    "...helps me a lot in nightshift..." - T.T. (US)

    "I am most definitely sleeping better." - A.B. (UK)

    "It's been the BEST solution for my severe jet-lag symptoms..." - A.R. (US)

     

       

      The fundamental issue of modern day life is the lack of sunshine as most of our daily routines keep us inside away from natural light. If you have a friend or loved one who could benefit from our devices, please share this campaign with them!

      Share the HumanCharger® - Benefits of Sunlight On-Demand - campaign using Share Tools located in the toolbar next to the video at the top of the page.

      You can also simply copy & paste the campaign URL above and share it any way you'd like.

      Thank you!

       

      Press Inquiries

      For press inquiries about the HumanCharger® Wireless Headset, please contact us at

      indiegogo@humancharger.com

       

      HumanCharger®

      Human Charger

story:
We will deliver the first 70 Ita.fra IMMEDIATELY.

Have you ever wondered about the quality of your drinking water at home, and getting purified water from grocery stores all the time might be that too troublesome?  Are you tired of finding the perfect filter for your tap water, or frustrated with how frequently you have to change the filters? Well, you don’t have to search anymore!

Introducing Ita.fra, the world’s first water-quality-visible pitcher with patented Charbone™ Filter technology. Not only does the Ita.fra detect water quality immediately, it uses UV light to filter and disinfect the harmful elements of your drinking water.  The filter has a service life of 150 Gallons of water, which is 2400 cups before replacing a new Charbone™.

Tap water is not always safe to drink, it can be contaminated flowing through the pipes that have been used for decades, a lot of chemicals could be left in the tap water during the process of water purification etc., which might cause hair loss, dry skin, red eyes and more. So to be able to drink clean water, a reliable water filter pitcher is exactly what we need.

Patented Atombit™ Monitor: detect and display the critical water quality index (COD, TOC, and Uv254) of your drinking water in real-time. See the water quality, rather than feeling or brand effect. It also functions as a reminder to replace the Charbone™ filter when the index turns to high.

Ita.fra features a reading panel that shows COD (chemical oxygen demand -- which should be within 0-1), TOC (total organic carbon -- should be within 0-1), UV254 (measurement of the organic matter in water -- should be within 0-120) of your drinking water, so you will know the exact quality of your water. Drink knowing it’s the purest water possible.

CHARBONE™ is a modified active carbon impregnated with nano zero-valent iron and nano silver. Nano-scale zero-valent (nZVI) metal is a suitable material for groundwater and wastewater treatment applications. It can prevent the agglomeration of nanoparticles and increase their hydraulic conductivity. Thanks to its Lid-free design, filling in the pitcher is incredibly easy too! Charbone filtration allows you to efficiently remove bacteria and heavy metals, including Chlorine, Antibiotic, Pesticide, Microorganism, Trichmethane, Lead, Mercury, Arsenic, Cadmium, Chromium, Zine, Selenium and more!

Thanks to the unique texture and surface chemistry of the filter, Charbone™ can last a long service life of 150 Gallons of water at a high flow rate of 0.8 liters per minute, three to four times faster than a standard AC filtration pitchers. Enjoy the filter-as-pour experience for 2400 cups before replacing a new Charbone™. Replacing the filter will only takes seconds!

Chlorination is one of many methods that can be used to disinfect water. This method was first used over a century ago, and is still used today. It is a chemical disinfection method that uses various types of chlorine or chlorine-containing substances for the oxidation and disinfection of what will be the potable water source. Ita.fra’s Charbone filter will filter out Chlorine, which makes the water taste better and it takes away the odor of the water as well. But when the chlorine is filtered out, microorganism and bacteria will come back again, so that’s why you need UV disinfection as the last defence against microorganism and bacteria.

With a built-in UV light transmitter at the bottom of the handle, Ita.fra automatically releases invisible short-wavelength ultraviolet (UV-C) light every 10 seconds to kill or inactivate microorganisms in filtered water by destroying nucleic acids and disrupting their DNA, keeping your water clean for a week or even longer.

 

Unlike chemical approaches to water disinfection, UV provides rapid, effective inactivation of microorganisms through a physical process. When bacteria, viruses, and protozoa are exposed to the germicidal wavelengths of UV light, they are rendered incapable of reproducing and infecting. The UV light has demonstrated efficacy against pathogenic organisms, including those responsible for cholera, polio, typhoid, hepatitis, and other bacterial, viral, and parasitic diseases. In addition, UV light (either alone or in conjunction with hydrogen peroxide) can destroy chemical contaminants such as pesticides, industrial solvents, and pharmaceuticals through a process called UV-oxidation.

Features a Type-C cable, Ita.fra is incredibly easy to charge too! One single charge can last you for three weeks!

And that's not all, accelerated flow rate reduces the need for large reservoir tank; compact design for easy lifting and refrigerator storage; built with BPA-free material; replacing filter only takes few seconds; Two-year warranty for Ita.fra pitcher(except filter).This is truly the most convenient water filter pitcher you can find on the market!

A three-year investigation by the Environmental Working Group (EWG) of the country's drinking water found that water flowing to about 85 percent of the population contains 316 contaminants – over 60 percent of these have no safety standards and are not regulated by the Environmental Protection Agency.

No wonder, then, that almost half of Americans who drink tap water at home say they filter or boil it first. That's according to Consumer Reports' 2019 Water Quality Survey, based on a nationally representative sample of 4,225 U.S. adults. The most prominent complaint people had about their drinking water was unpleasant tastes and smells. That's why we set out to create Ita.fra!

We have finished the trial production, and the Ita.fra is ready to ship, the first patch of Ita.fra will be shipped in April!

Itafra is a company team up the top experts of water filtration industry including water quality detect sensor, filter formulation and related.
Our vision is very simple, use our professional to  combine our advance technology to create useful products to solve the problem of user.
We are not only provide the solution on safe, health and good taste of water.
We also provide the solution to let users know what the quality of water they get by visible data.

So to be able to drink clean water, a reliable water filter pitcher is exactly what we need.

Patented Atombit™ Monitor: detect and display the critical water quality index (COD, TOC, and Uv254) of your drinking water in real-time. See the water quality, rather than feeling or brand effect. It also functions as a reminder to replace the Charbone™ filter when the index turns to high.

Ita.fra features a reading panel that shows COD (chemical oxygen demand -- which should be within 0-1), TOC (total organic carbon -- should be within 0-1), UV254 (measurement of the organic matter in water -- should be within 0-120) of your drinking water, so you will know the exact quality of your water. Drink knowing it’s the purest water possible.

CHARBONE™ is a modified active carbon impregnated with nano zero-valent iron and nano silver. Nano-scale zero-valent (nZVI) metal is a suitable material for groundwater and wastewater treatment applications. It can prevent the agglomeration of nanoparticles and increase their hydraulic conductivity. Thanks to its Lid-free design, filling in the pitcher is incredibly easy too! Charbone filtration allows you to efficiently remove bacteria and heavy metals, including Chlorine, Antibiotic, Pesticide, Microorganism, Trichmethane, Lead, Mercury, Arsenic, Cadmium, Chromium, Zine, Selenium and more!

Thanks to the unique texture and surface chemistry of the filter, Charbone™ can last a long service life of 150 Gallons of water at a high flow rate of 0.8 liters per minute, three to four times faster than a standard AC filtration pitchers. Enjoy the filter-as-pour experience for 2400 cups before replacing a new Charbone™. Replacing the filter will only takes seconds!



Chlorination is one of many methods that can be used to disinfect water. This method was first used over a century ago, and is still used today. It is a chemical disinfection method that uses various types of chlorine or chlorine-containing substances for the oxidation and disinfection of what will be the potable water source. Ita.fra’s Charbone filter will filter out Chlorine, which makes the water taste better and it takes away the odor of the water as well. But when the chlorine is filtered out, microorganism and bacteria will come back again, so that’s why you need UV disinfection as the last defence against microorganism and bacteria.

With a built-in UV light transmitter at the bottom of the handle, Ita.fra automatically releases invisible short-wavelength ultraviolet (UV-C) light every 10 seconds to kill or inactivate microorganisms in filtered water by destroying nucleic acids and disrupting their DNA, keeping your water clean for a week or even longer.




 

Unlike chemical approaches to water disinfection, UV provides rapid, effective inactivation of microorganisms through a physical process. When bacteria, viruses, and protozoa are exposed to the germicidal wavelengths of UV light, they are rendered incapable of reproducing and infecting. The UV light has demonstrated efficacy against pathogenic organisms, including those responsible for cholera, polio, typhoid, hepatitis, and other bacterial, viral, and parasitic diseases. In addition, UV light (either alone or in conjunction with hydrogen peroxide) can destroy chemical contaminants such as pesticides, industrial solvents, and pharmaceuticals through a process called UV-oxidation.


Features a Type-C cable, Ita.fra is incredibly easy to charge too! One single charge can last you for three weeks!

And that's not all, accelerated flow rate reduces the need for large reservoir tank; compact design for easy lifting and refrigerator storage; built with BPA-free material; replacing filter only takes few seconds; Two-year warranty for Ita.fra pitcher(except filter).This is truly the most convenient water filter pitcher you can find on the market!





A three-year investigation by the Environmental Working Group (EWG) of the country's drinking water found that water flowing to about 85 percent of the population contains 316 contaminants – over 60 percent of these have no safety standards and are not regulated by the Environmental Protection Agency.
No wonder, then, that almost half of Americans who drink tap water at home say they filter or boil it first. That's according to Consumer Reports' 2019 Water Quality Survey, based on a nationally representative sample of 4,225 U.S. adults. The most prominent complaint people had about their drinking water was unpleasant tastes and smells. That's why we set out to create Ita.fra!

We have finished the trial production, and the Ita.fra is ready to ship, the first patch of Ita.fra will be shipped in April!

Itafra is a company team up the top experts of water filtration industry including water quality detect sensor, filter formulation and related.Our vision is very simple, use our professional to  combine our advance technology to create useful products to solve the problem of user.We are not only provide the solution on safe, health and good taste of water.We also provide the solution to let users know what the quality of water they get by visible data.

story:
The eyes definitely have it! What this poor child of God is looking at is a horror that most of the people on this earth must face over and over again throughout their lives!

My name is David Patrick Wilson.  My pure intention is to eradicate HSV 1&2 (aka 'Herpes') from the planet, RIGHT NOW! 

You can help!

 

We are very close to stopping one of the most prevalent and damaging epidemics plaguing the world today, of which too few are willing to even speak, namely the 'herpes simplex virus' or HSV.  The World Health Organization (WHO) estimates that between 65-90% of the people of earth are suffering from some form of this virus. The Center for Disease Control (CDC) in Atlanta, GA puts US estimates even higher. If you ever had chicken pox, kissed someone with HSV or had sexual contact with anyone who has it, you are a prime candidate for a potential 'outbreak!' It's  time for the People to take things into our own hands and put an end to the cause of this pain and suffering, simply because we can!

 

We call our project, "Herpeze: The Solution." It truly is and we are certain that it will work after hundreds of applications on human subjects that have produced near perfect results since very early in our process. We have not sought FDA approvals, nor will we. We don't require it. Besides, the truth is they are owned by 'Big Pharma!'  (They are making incredible money off of the misery of this, up to now, 'incurable' affliction!) The fact is, it is high time for them to step aside.

We, the People, can get it done! We are in need of these funds to secure basic commercial protections (trademarks, copyrights, patents, etc.), purchase ingredients, buy equipment, set up 'clean rooms' and produce, market and distribute, 'The Solution Kit' throughout the planet. This modest campaign will launch us. The funds obtained here will also be used to hire US workers, acquire the components locally, assemble, pack and ship 'The Solution Kit' to the four corners of the earth. 

 

 

There are an estimated SIX (6) BILLION potential users, eagerly, anxiously, painfully awaiting us to start shipping 'The Solution.'. Help us get them relief! 

The time is NOW! Everything is ready, tried and tested. It's safe. No harmful drugs! No toxic soup! No hazardous waste! 'The Solution' is all natural, inexpensive and easy to use. It does not require weeks or months of a daily regimen of ingesting minerals, potions, pills and prescriptions. There are no books you have to read with incantations or rituals you need to practice to be relieved of the problem. There is a simple 'kit' with a written guarantee, four (4) tablets, two (2) glass jars, four (4) applicators and a single page of instructions. The rest you supply in your own home! 'The Solution' is your solution!!! 

JUST THINK OF IT! NOW YOU CAN REJOICE! The only thing you have to fear is freedom from this evil epidemic. All you have to lose are the 'zosters' and the 'pox' on you, your family and friends. We know that you or someone you know is a victim of this blight. Don't you want to get this struggle over with and move on to a better life?

If the answer is 'yes', please join us and let's make 2014, "FREE of HSV!'  

Thank you and God Bless!

story:
About Me

My name is Alex Stankiewicz and I am currently third year Ph.D. student in the Anatomy and Neurobiology department at Boston University School of Medicine. I originally moved to Boston to earn my undergraduate degree in Psychology and Philosophy from Boston University.  Continuing at the University, I went on to join the Department as a Ph.D. student working in Dr. Irina Zhdanova’s Sleep and Circadian Physiology lab.  In my spare time, I enjoy volunteering at a local women’s shelter, fishing, playing basketball, and following local Boston sports teams.

Why Indiegogo?

Each year, less and less money is being allocated to science research.  Funding for research projects is reaching new levels of competitiveness and even the most cutting-edge projects proposals can be turned down. I see crowd-sourcing science as a potential new platform to fund projects. People now have the opportunity to fund research that is inline with their interests and beliefs.

Impact of Research

My research focuses on the role sleep and daily rhythms has on the survival and incorporation of newly formed brain cells (neurons).  It has long been accepted in the field of neuroscience that no new neurons are ever formed.  Only recently has this dogma been overturned by the discovery that neurogenesis (meaning the birth of new neurons) occurs in 2 regions: the hippocampus and the olfactory bulb.  However, why aren’t these new cells replacing neurons lost from aging, injury (blunt trauma or stroke) or neurodegenerative disease (Alzheimer’s, Parkinson’s, Huntington’s)?

While many labs are dedicated to answering this question, they have overlooked many basic things that are not yet known: what time of the day are new neurons born and how does sleep/wake cycle or lack thereof affect survival and incorporation? We are setting out to answer these questions and investigating the phenomenon of neurogenesis from a different angle: sleep and daily rhythms.

Mostly everyone has heard how important it is to get the suggested 8 hours of sleep a night, but it is not possible for many to do so.  The most avoidable sleep disruption is a result of shift work. Shift workers are defined as those with a schedule outside of a 9 to 5 business day, such as employees in hotels, restaurants and transportation industries. Almost 20% of the working population in the United States, 17% in Europe and 36% in China participate in shift work. Sleep disruptions also affects travelers suffering from jet lag or the person who stays up too late at night finishing a movie.  We know how terrible we feel when we don’t get a good nights sleep, but what we don’t know is what is happening internally, more specifically how is neurogenesis affected?

How new neurons survive and grow could depend greatly on maintaining a consistent daily routine and sleep/wake cycle.  With your donation we can continue to investigate how disruptions in our biological clock influences neurogenesis, only then we can begin to understand how to control neurogenesis to help those afflicted with Parkinsons, Alzheimer’s, Huntington’s or other traumas.

Sleep and Daily Rhythms

All organisms, from a simple bacteria to a complex animal (e.g. humans), contain an internal 24-hour “clock” corresponding to the time it takes the earth to orbit on its axis. These clocks drive our “circadian rhythms”. This term derives from the latin (circa) meaning "around" and diem, meaning "day".  Circadian rhythms dictate biological and behavioral processes such as sleep/wake and metabolism schedules. They persist for 24-hours regardless of external time cues, the most prominent being the light/dark cycle. Light is the most powerful timekeeping cue, that gradually resets the internal clock to begin another 24-hour cycle.

So why is it important for us to have a consistent 24-hour light/dark cycle? We can think of the light-dark cycle as the conductor of a musical symphony. Without a conductor, the instruments will still play, but are out of sync and the musical piece will be degraded to noise. Without a consistent light-dark cycle our circadian clocks are disrupted and biological rhythms are desynchronized which can lead to serious consequences on our bodies.

Why Fish?

Both zebrafish and humans are vertebrates that share ⅔ of their genetic makeup.  Unlike the more commonly used research animals--mice and rats which are nocturnal--whereas zebrafish and humans are diurnal, active during the day and rest at night. Conserved core circadian mechanisms, including clock gene expression and fluctuations in circulating melatonin, follow similar temporal patterns in nocturnal and diurnal animals, but the downstream processes they control have a 12-hour phase difference. The variation in downstream processes may partially account for the behavioral states (e.g. sleep/wake cycles), cognitive performance, and body temperature known to exist in antiphase in diurnal and nocturnal animals.  Additionally, zebrafish produce a large number of new neurons which makes it easier for us to study neurogenesis.

Use of Funds

Your pledge funds will be used to purchase new reagents (such as BrdU, immunohistochemical staining kits and slides) necessary to conduct new experiments.  In order to analyze the results, we rent time on a powerful 1 million dollar confocal microscope.  We are in the process of organizing a paper for publication in a scientific journal, so any results from this investigation will be sent to those who donate.

Other ways to help

Even if you are unable to contribute, please help us spread the word. Share our campaign with your friends and family.

story:
“Life Safe.4U” monitoring system

  • My name is Eric Rae. I have been successfully self-employed for the past 35 years and I am an inventor. My interests are varied but I am most passionate about how technology can be employed in order to improve the quality of life.
  • An illness that I suffered not long ago got me thinking of how I could avoid a recurrence. Having devised a means to monitor the elements which led to the condition I needed to find a way to summon help should I find myself in a similar predicament while on my own.
  • After much experimentation, I have succeeded in developing an advanced methodology that amply meets this need. In simple terms, it is a smart phone/cloud based monitoring system that will literally be a lifesaver. What’s more, the projected price level of this application cannot be matched anywhere in the world. As a lifestyle aid, it has no peer. And the target market is vast.  

What does the product do?

  • The system is especially helpful for patients suffering from chronic conditions. It is also extremely useful in the management of medication and in ensuring that proper routines are followed. This is of particular relevance to diabetes sufferers.  It can also be applied in situations that have a potentially harmful outcome, such as when a person with an allergy to bee stings enters an area that is populated by bees. In any such situation, the application would send an emergency message advising the reason for the call and the GPS location.
  • Privacy is a value to be guarded, especially in light of the recent disclosures that governments are monitoring their own citizens. This application differs from all others in that it does not trace your movements – your privacy is respected at all times. GPS locations are only sent to responders once there is a suspected emergency.
  • As an added bonus, this technology could also proactively report your smart phone as missing even before you become aware of it, as well as providing its last known location. This feature alone makes the application worth acquiring.
  • The system, therefore, has elements that address accident response, health monitoring, chronic medication management, frail-care, and numerous other conditions. But it is not only for the elderly or sufferers of chronic illnesses. It may also be a life-saving device in situations where events beyond your control may cause you to lose consciousness or be incapacitated.
  • It can also be used as a quick-response mechanism in case of break-in at your home or business premises. Of course, you may manage a 911 call if you are lucky enough to be in a country where such a service is operational. On the other hand, our technology can be programmed to contact numerous individuals as well as security organisations you may be subscribed to. The options are unlimited.
  • The intention is to make the system available for a fraction of what emergency monitoring organisations charge. Features such as the proactive element – unique to this technology – can be partly replicated by having a manned monitoring service at exorbitant cost. Our technology monitors many parameters an unlimited number of times per day. Should there be a problem; an  emergency message will in all likelihood be sent far faster than a monitoring service could do so.
  • Those who will benefit most from this technology include chronic sufferers from
    • Diabetes
    • Cardiac conditions
    • Epilepsy
    • Hypertension
    • Asthma

 What’s in it for you?

  • In order to bring this life-saving invention to market, an unlimited number of early adopters are required. If you wish to be one of them, you will also be helping in the development and introduction of life-saving technology – as well as improving the quality of life of millions of people.
  • Early adopters will receive the application as well as four months of cloud support valued at US$16 for US$8.  You will also qualify for a 25% discount on cloud services in perpetuity.  The cloud becomes the point of initiation, from which all messages are relayed, thereby saving you the costs of sending multiple messages.
  • To complete this project on Android, Apple IOS, BlackBerry OS10, Windows 8 Mobile as well as the cloud monitoring element, will cost US$93 000 in addition to what has already been invested. To date the system has been developed to the stage where it has certain prime functionalities.
  • A large part of the application development cost has been self-funded.  In the unlikely event that the project is not fully subscribed, there will in any case be sufficient equity to qualify for bridging finance in order to deliver a working product.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Spread the word amongst friends and acquaintances who might want to be involved in this extremely worthwhile project. This is technology that is truly indispensible across a broad spectrum of the community.
  • Should you be interested or know someone who would be interested in becoming a strategic partner/Investor, please contact me on eric@infohigh.co.za

An illness that I suffered not long ago got me thinking of how I could avoid a recurrence. Having devised a means to monitor the elements which led to the condition I needed to find a way to summon help should I find myself in a similar predicament while on my own.

GPS locations are only sent to responders once there is a suspected emergency.
As an added bonus, this technology could also proactively report your smart phone as missing even before you become aware of it, as well as providing its last known location. This feature alone makes the application worth acquiring.
The system, therefore, has elements that address accident response, health monitoring, chronic medication management, frail-care, and numerous other conditions. Diabetes


Cardiac conditions


Epilepsy


Hypertension


Asthma
