story:
((IF YOU ARE A "PRODUCT ADVERTISER" PLEASE DO NOT EMAIL ME AND SAY YOU'LL ADVERTISE MY CAMPAIGN FOR MONEY. IF YOU HAVE READ THIS YOU WOULD OF NOTICED I HAVE NO MONEY. I will reject your offers, so stop wasting yours and my time!!!))

Hello and thank you for looking at this emergency need campain. I am 21 years old and I seriously need your help! I need some dental work that is mandatory for my health asap. When I was younger I was forced into orthodontic work. At the end I was forced by my guardians and the orthodontist into getting a permanent retainer put in. Which is illegal in the mass majority of the united states, for many reasons. Sadly it is not illegal in all. I never had my wisdom teeth removed because my guardians refused to take me in before they rooted. I am now stuck with no insurance, refusals for a medical loan repeatedly and in constant pain. My wisdom teeth pushing my teeth forwards fighting one another constantly. This isn't just painful it is causing jaw bone damage. My left upper wisdom tooth broke on its way in and never passed the gum line. Making this all more complicated.  Ontop of that the left wisdom tooth has a large abscess underneath it. Eating any kind of sugar is excruciatingly painful, eating period is painful. The image above also shows another issue with my teeth. The tooth next to the left k9 is actually starting to be forcefully overlapped.  There is also an abscess under this tooth.

I am going too need a dental sergeon to remove the wisdom teeth. Rooted wisdom teeth normally require a dental sergeon because pulling them normally is too risky. They are really close to nervs. Then I am going to require the permanent retainer removed, a new one made for me. I'm going to refuse permanent this time, not making that mistake again. The front tooth pulled.

The dental sergeon + dental office's estimates total around 4 grand. Since I have no form of income, insurance and being being refused for medical loans. I have no one to turn too but you.
If you cannot donate, you can do something else. Please pass this onto as many people as possible! 

PLEASE HELP ME! & THANK YOU!

story:
Upower was created in October 2013 to provide teenagers in King County the opportunity to participate in no-cost fitness classes after school. Cofounder Martha Moseley, an accomplished athlete and fitness advocate, noticed a lack of fitness resources and wanted to help teens pursue healthy and active lifestyles. 

The idea of Upower is simple. Several times a week teens can participate in fitness classes near their high school. We currently teach classes in six different locations. No two classes are the same. Upower coaches lead workouts that emphasize cardiovascular fitness, strength training and conditioning, and active stretching. A class generally consists of warming up, stretching, the "Workout of the Day," cool down, and a fun game at the end.

Since our first classes in Spring of 2014, we have seen nearly 500 participants, held 383 classes, and have clocked in at 28,800 minutes of fitness. 

All contributions will be used for general support of Upower operations including buying equipment such as dumbbells, kettlebells, boxes, yoga mats, medicine balls, etc. Contributions will also support our effort to expand to new locations. 

As a 501(c)(3) public charity, Upower relies on generous contributions from our community to make all programming possible.  Contributions to Upower are tax-deductible to the extent permitted by law.  Upower’s tax identification is 46-4220284 and the organization’s mailing address is PO Box 21866, Seattle, WA 98111-3866.

www.u-power.org 

UPOWER is a trademark of Upower.

story:
Who We Are

In 2002, while pregnant with our son, Colleen's left lower leg began to swell. The doctors that she went to first explained the swelling and enlargement as pregnancy swelling and would go away with the birth of our son.

Many doctors thought she had tumor or even a blocked vein that was causing the continuous swelling of the leg. Unhappy with the various opinions from other doctors we met with a Vascular Surgeon, who, after some research, finally diagnosed Colleen’s condition as Primary Lymphedema.

From that point on our lives were turned upside down as there very few treatment options available. What was made clear, was that unlike tumors which can be removed, or vein blockages that can be unblocked, there is no cure for Lymphedema.

There is however, only various types of treatment that focuses on reducing the swelling and controlling the pain. The most common type of treatments are manual lymph drainage (MLD) or complete decongestive therapy (CDT). Most of these treatments, if began at the very onset of the swelling, can help in the control and maintaining of lymphedema.

However, when the diagnosis goes on for so long that the affected limb cannot be treated, the lymphedema can become extreme. Once the lymphedema has achieved this state, it becomes quiet difficult, if not nearly impossible to control, let alone maintain.

The biggest issue facing Colleen living with lymphedema is not necessarily the lack of proper diagnosis, proper treatment, and proper therapy. It is the fact that insurance is unwilling or unable to address her long term needs.

What We Need

We found a way for Colleen to take back her life from Lymhedema.  A Specialized Lymphatic surgery that will reduce her leg back to within 90% - 95% of its original size.  Insurance previously denied her this surgery as it was "experimental and investigational".  We are looking to work with the hospital to maybe get them to help out with lowering expenses and paying for the Dr.'s payment.  But we are still going to need a lot of money.
 
We need your help.  We are looking for 30,000 at least which is eay to do.  All we need is 300 people to donate $100, or 600 to donate $50.  This surgery will change Colleen's life forever.  She will always have to wear compression garments and always have to have massage therapy to maintain the size fo her leg, but at least she will no longer have to worry about people staring at her, bulling her or making her feel like is a circus side show.

The Impact

Currently there is no cure for lymphedema there is only the control and maintainance of this condition, and without proper treatment such as Physical Therapies, Manual Lymph Drainage, the use of bandage wrappings and the wearing of custom made garments this condition will become life threatening from infections.  This surgery will change Colleen's life, our lives and the way she views herself. 

 

Help Colleen get her life back from this horrible affliction!!!

story:
Doctors can't help Jordan but you can help her get through this by helping her bite West Nile back, 1 Bite at a time.

1 mosquito bit this vibrant teen, infecting her with the worst strand of West Nile. West Nile Meningoencephalitis, a rare severe strand of the virus indefinitely attacks Jordan's nervous system causing her brain to inflame thus leaving her susceptible to brain damage, paralysis, coma, seizures, memory loss, loss of vision, limbs, motor skills, or even worse death.

There's no vaccine and no medicine to help this teen fight the bite. Doctors can only treat the symptoms and possibly help her recover from the damage done on her body

Jordan can't do this without you. She needs you to help her bite West Nile back in order to recover from the damage done to her life as a result of only one mosquito bite.

Don't underestimate the difference you can make in Jordan's life. There's power in 1. One mosquito changed Jordan's life for the worst and you, yes you, there's only one of you and you are the 1 person who has the power to give Jordan, her younger brother and mom what they need to recover and bite West Nile back.

The 1 things she needs you to do:

 

  • Make a $1 donation on this site, via CHASE BANK online or at any CHASE location to account-

    "THE CONNER FAMILY TRUST"

  • Share Jordan's video & story with 1 person; ask they also donate $1

  • Stop this virus from spreading. Protect yourself & loved ones from being infected by making  1 decision; the choice  to follow the 4D's plan (google it)

    **You're welcome to donate more but PLEASE KNOW even $1 makes difference  we're most grateful.

More details & media links about Jordan's story is featured on the updates tab locate at the top of this page.

 Visit us on Facebook:

www.facebook.com/ebonie.ireign

www.facebook.com/ebonie.conner.9

Contact Us via Email: eboniemaxwell40@gmail.com

Their story has recently been featured on: CNN, NBC, ABC, CBS, FOX, CW, USA TODAY, LA Times, Dallas Morning News, FT Worth Star Telegram, Headline News, Denver Post and other media outlets across the country.

story:
UPDATE

Wenn wir bei Erreichen unseres Ziels idealerweise noch 3000€ von Google bekommen, gibt es ein Upgrade der "1-Tages-Dreh"-Fotostory:

Eine "3-Tages-Dreh"- VIDEOstory!

Unser Ziel

Wir sind ein angehendes Social Start-Up mit dem Ziel, das Mindset benachteiligter Jugendlicher zu ändern, um deren Bildungserfolg messbar zu erhöhen. Zusammen mit Medienschaffenden und Motivationspsychologen entwickeln wir innovative Medienformate für Jugendliche nach dem „Entertainment-Education“ Prinzip:

Mit einer unterhaltsamen Story erreichen wir die Jugendlichen, so dass Sie am Ende sagen: „Ich kann das auch schaffen".

Welches Problem lösen wir?

Das Kernproblem benachteiligter Jugendlicher ist deren statische Einstellung (Fixed Mindset). Ein schwieriges familiäres und soziales Umfeld, das Fehlen positiver Vorbilder sowie die Vorurteile von Lehrern und Gesellschaft projizieren dieses statische Selbstbild auf die Jugendlichen. Symptomatisch dafür sind beispielsweise häufige Aussprüche wie „Ich bin nur ein dummer Hauptschüler“ oder „Ich kann das nicht“. Diese Einstellung hemmt massiv deren weitere Entwicklung und unterdrückt schon im Keim die Motivation. Die Folge sind niedriger Bildungserfolg - jedes Jahr beginnen ca. 150.000 Jugendliche ihr Erwerbsleben ohne Ausbildungsabschluss - und damit einhergehend eingeschränkte soziale Mobilität und die Verschwendung von Potenzial, das für Gesellschaft sowie Wirtschaft von großem Wert ist.

Der Lösungsansatz

Um den Bildungserfolg zielgruppenspezifisch und breitenwirksam zu erhöhen entwickeln wir Medienformate nach dem "Entertainment-Education" Prinzip. Bisher wird dieses Prinzip in Entwicklungsländern eingesetzt, um Menschen z.B. mit spannenden Telenovelas zu erreichen, zu berühren und mit einer durchdachten Story zur Änderung ihres  Verhaltens zu bewegen. Damit wird z.B. Analphabetismus oder AIDS bekämpft - mit großem sozialen aber auch kommerziellen Erfolg!

Unsere Innovation: Dieses Prinzip wollen wir als eine neue Möglichkeit nutzen, um die Einstellung von Jugendlichen von einem "Fixed Mindset" zu einem "Growth Mindset" zu verändern (inspiriert von Carol Dweck) - also:

"Ich kann das nicht" wird zu "Ich nehme die Herausforderung an"!

Mit der Kampagne möchten wir den Prototypen einer "Mindchanging Story" entwickeln, die später Inhalt einer Telenovela im Netz sein kann. Gleichzeitig soll in einem Workshop zusammen mit Medienexperten, Drehbuchautoren, Bildungsexperten, Psychologen und Jugendlichen ein ansprechendes Medienformat für Jugendliche entwickelt werden (z.B. mit optimaler Einbindung von Social Media, Video-Plattformen, etc.). Das Ergebnis ist ein erster Produktentwurf.

Danach werden wir ausgiebig im sozialen Umfeld der Jugendlichen recherchieren und den Entwurf einer transmedialen "mindchanging Web-Telenovela" in engem Kontakt mit Schülern weiterentwickeln. Das Projekt soll zudem wissenschaftlich begleitet werden, um einen messbaren Effekt auf die Einstellung der Jugendlichen nachzuweisen.

Mit Einbindung von Jugendlichen, professionellen Medienschaffenden sowie einer wissenschaftlichen Begleitung, entstehen so maßgeschneiderte Medienformate für die Zielgruppe Jugendlicher - mit messbarem sozialen wie kommerziellen Erfolg.

Unterstützt uns...

...und helft das Potenzial dieser Jugendlichen zu entfalten!

Wir möchten insgesamt 3000€ für unsere nächsten wichtigen Schritte einsammeln:

  • 500€ für einen 1-Tages Design-Thinking Workshop zur Entwicklung eines innovativen Medienformats für Jugendliche – die Workshopleiterin und ca. 15 Teilnehmer aus Medien, Bildung und Wissenschaft, sowie Jugendlichen, werden gemeinsam einen Prototypen des Medienformats entwickeln.
  • 1000€ für einen „1-Tages-Dreh“ einer Fotostory* zusammen mit Jugendlichen, um einen Prototypen für Entertainment Education Inhalte zu erstellen:
    Im ersten Schritt entwickelt ein professioneller Drebuchautor eine kurze Story nach dem Entertainment-Education Prinzip in Zusammenarbeit mit einem Motivationspsychologen/Bildungswissenschaftler. Im zweiten Schritt werden Schüler gecastet, die diese Story im dritten Schritt mit einem professionellen Regisseur und Fotografen schauspielerisch umsetzen.
  • 1500€ für eine Plattform Strategie und einem ansprechenden Internetauftritt, gestaltet von unserer Kommunikationsberatung Nufari

*wenn wir bei Erreichen unseres Ziels idealerweise noch 3000€ von Google bekommen, gibt es ein Upgrade der "1-Tages-Dreh"-Fotostory: Eine "3-Tages-Dreh"- Videostory!

Ein Dankeschön für die finanzielle Unterstützung

Unseren Crowdfunding-Unterstützern sagen wir jetzt schon „Herzlichen Dank!“
Wir würden uns freuen mit unseren Unterstützern auch persönlich in Kontakt zu treten. Dafür haben wir verschiedene Dankeschöns ("Perks").

Wenn ihr unsere Idee gut findet...

...teilt den Link auf Facebook und leitet eine Email direkt weiter an zwei Eurer Freunde! (Benutzt dazu am Besten die Tools unter dem Video)

Besucht auch gerne unsere Facebook-Seite!
story_txt:
UPDATE
Wenn wir bei Erreichen unseres Ziels idealerweise noch 3000€ von Google bekommen, gibt es ein Upgrade der "1-Tages-Dreh"-Fotostory:
Eine "3-Tages-Dreh"- VIDEOstory!
Unser Ziel
Wir sind ein angehendes Social Start-Up mit dem Ziel, das Mindset benachteiligter Jugendlicher zu ändern, um deren Bildungserfolg messbar zu erhöhen. Zusammen mit Medienschaffenden und Motivationspsychologen entwickeln wir innovative Medienformate für Jugendliche nach dem „Entertainment-Education“ Prinzip:
Mit einer unterhaltsamen Story erreichen wir die Jugendlichen, so dass Sie am Ende sagen: „Ich kann das auch schaffen".


Welches Problem lösen wir?
Das Kernproblem benachteiligter Jugendlicher ist deren statische Einstellung (Fixed Mindset). Ein schwieriges familiäres und soziales Umfeld, das Fehlen positiver Vorbilder sowie die Vorurteile von Lehrern und Gesellschaft projizieren dieses statische Selbstbild auf die Jugendlichen. Symptomatisch dafür sind beispielsweise häufige Aussprüche wie „Ich bin nur ein dummer Hauptschüler“ oder „Ich kann das nicht“. Diese Einstellung hemmt massiv deren weitere Entwicklung und unterdrückt schon im Keim die Motivation. Die Folge sind niedriger Bildungserfolg - jedes Jahr beginnen ca. 150.000 Jugendliche ihr Erwerbsleben ohne Ausbildungsabschluss - und damit einhergehend eingeschränkte soziale Mobilität und die Verschwendung von Potenzial, das für Gesellschaft sowie Wirtschaft von großem Wert ist.

Der Lösungsansatz
Um den Bildungserfolg zielgruppenspezifisch und breitenwirksam zu erhöhen entwickeln wir Medienformate nach dem "Entertainment-Education" Prinzip. Bisher wird dieses Prinzip in Entwicklungsländern eingesetzt, um Menschen z.B. mit spannenden Telenovelas zu erreichen, zu berühren und mit einer durchdachten Story zur Änderung ihres  Verhaltens zu bewegen. Damit wird z.B. Analphabetismus oder AIDS bekämpft - mit großem sozialen aber auch kommerziellen Erfolg!
Unsere Innovation: Dieses Prinzip wollen wir als eine neue Möglichkeit nutzen, um die Einstellung von Jugendlichen von einem "Fixed Mindset" zu einem "Growth Mindset" zu verändern (inspiriert von Carol Dweck) - also:
"Ich kann das nicht" wird zu "Ich nehme die Herausforderung an"!
Mit der Kampagne möchten wir den Prototypen einer "Mindchanging Story" entwickeln, die später Inhalt einer Telenovela im Netz sein kann. Gleichzeitig soll in einem Workshop zusammen mit Medienexperten, Drehbuchautoren, Bildungsexperten, Psychologen und Jugendlichen ein ansprechendes Medienformat für Jugendliche entwickelt werden (z.B. mit optimaler Einbindung von Social Media, Video-Plattformen, etc.). Das Ergebnis ist ein erster Produktentwurf.
Danach werden wir ausgiebig im sozialen Umfeld der Jugendlichen recherchieren und den Entwurf einer transmedialen "mindchanging Web-Telenovela" in engem Kontakt mit Schülern weiterentwickeln. Das Projekt soll zudem wissenschaftlich begleitet werden, um einen messbaren Effekt auf die Einstellung der Jugendlichen nachzuweisen.
Mit Einbindung von Jugendlichen, professionellen Medienschaffenden sowie einer wissenschaftlichen Begleitung, entstehen so maßgeschneiderte Medienformate für die Zielgruppe Jugendlicher - mit messbarem sozialen wie kommerziellen Erfolg.
Unterstützt uns...
...und helft das Potenzial dieser Jugendlichen zu entfalten!
Wir möchten insgesamt 3000€ für unsere nächsten wichtigen Schritte einsammeln:

500€ für einen 1-Tages Design-Thinking Workshop zur Entwicklung eines innovativen Medienformats für Jugendliche – die Workshopleiterin und ca. 15 Teilnehmer aus Medien, Bildung und Wissenschaft, sowie Jugendlichen, werden gemeinsam einen Prototypen des Medienformats entwickeln.
1000€ für einen „1-Tages-Dreh“ einer Fotostory* zusammen mit Jugendlichen, um einen Prototypen für Entertainment Education Inhalte zu erstellen:Im ersten Schritt entwickelt ein professioneller Drebuchautor eine kurze Story nach dem Entertainment-Education Prinzip in Zusammenarbeit mit einem Motivationspsychologen/Bildungswissenschaftler. Im zweiten Schritt werden Schüler gecastet, die diese Story im dritten Schritt mit einem professionellen Regisseur und Fotografen schauspielerisch umsetzen.
1500€ für eine Plattform Strategie und einem ansprechenden Internetauftritt, gestaltet von unserer Kommunikationsberatung Nufari





*wenn wir bei Erreichen unseres Ziels idealerweise noch 3000€ von Google bekommen, gibt es ein Upgrade der "1-Tages-Dreh"-Fotostory: Eine "3-Tages-Dreh"- Videostory!
Ein Dankeschön für die finanzielle Unterstützung

Unseren Crowdfunding-Unterstützern sagen wir jetzt schon „Herzlichen Dank!“Wir würden uns freuen mit unseren Unterstützern auch persönlich in Kontakt zu treten. Dafür haben wir verschiedene Dankeschöns ("Perks").
Wenn ihr unsere Idee gut findet...

...teilt den Link auf Facebook und leitet eine Email direkt weiter an zwei Eurer Freunde! (Benutzt dazu am Besten die Tools unter dem Video)
Besucht auch gerne unsere Facebook-Seite!

story:
We are Paskay Org

Paskay is a Quechua word which means to free yourself physically and spiritually. The organization Paskay aims to help people to help themselves through providing education, training and work opportunities as well as health and nutrition initiatives.

For this year 2012, we would sincerely like to invite you and your organization to be part of the following project of Creating an Organic Garden to supply organic food to our school kitchens in the sacred valley, Cusco which is desperately needed for the severely deprived students.

 

The need for creating an Organic Garden:

Nowadays, markets are filled with food produced with chemicals such as strong insecticides, hormones and genetically modified seeds, hence we would like to produce and grow our food organically, reviving and preserving ancient knowledge of nature.

Our garden will use natural fertilizers such as manure from animals, especially from Cuy (Guinea Pigs), as well as natural insecticides such as plant extracts.

Here, we will facilitate workshops to teach the effective ancient techniques of organic food production. The workshops will emphasize the protection of Pachamama (Mother Earth) and the reforestation of indigenous plants for native animal shelter.

In this garden we will plant medicine herbs, so the medicine people can teach the children how to make natural medicine from local plants.

 

In this Organic Garden, we intend to produce:

-          Organic cereals: Corn, Quinoa, Beans, Tarwi, Amaranth, Quichua, etc

-          Tubers: Potato, Ullucos, Carrots, Beets, etc

-          Organic Cucurbits: Pumpkin, common Italian squash

-          Vegetables: Onions, Tomatoes, Cauliflower, Lettuce, Cabbage, etc

-          Aromatic herbs: Chamomile, Fennel, Oregano, Coriander, etc

-          Small fruit: Strawberries,

-          Organic Fruits: Avocado, Apples, Peaches, Cherries, Oranges, etc

 

Cost of creating the garden of 3000m2, $3,000.00

-          Purchase of materials and tools for the construction

-          Transportation

-           Food for workers and volunteers

-          Other expenses

 

Maintenance cost, $3,600.00 a year

-          Payment for the agronomist

-          Seeds

-          Expenses for the Workshops for school children

-          Other expenses

 

The way you can also be part of these project is to help us to circulate this letter and invite other people and organizations to join us.

 

*Heart Greetings to you and to those around you*

 

 

YOURS SINCERELY

PASKAY ORG

Email: paskay1@hotmail.com

Website: www.paskay.org

Cusco – Peru

story:
Short Summary

My name is Peter Mbiria Maina, an innovator in the field of electrical and electronics Engineering. I am working with a team of creative guys at Voltarent ltd and this our first innovation, Smart E-con (Electric Convertible) wheelchair. The goal for this innovation is to enable the physically challenged persons to be:

1.Very mobile on almost all terrains (including African off-roads, flat surfaces, stairs etc)

2. Independent

3. Comfortable

4.Happy. 

This is very important to me because I want to create a positive impact on the lives of the persons who can't walk due to many reasons. It is about sharing the love I feel for them through creativity, innovation and technology.

 

Idea's Inception

This idea developed back in 2011 when a very close friend of mine, Miss Wairimu (She was a Kindergarten teacher) ended up using a manual wheelchair due to leg arthritis. She was a young mother and I could see how much she was struggling coping with her new state. I did an online search for a wheelchair that can be able to offer extreme mobility, independence and comfort and I didn't find any.

On December that year, I began designing a wheelchair on paper (didn't have a computer) secretly since I wanted to surprise her. I thought it would take a short while to design but it took longer than expected.

Sad to say, she passed on mid 2012 and it was a big blow to me, she left without knowing the surprise I was preparing for her. I kept working on it and in 2014, I made a proof of concept that I ran tests on.

 

What We Need

I was able to create a proof of concept using the little I had but to create a full scale product, I teamed up with a three guys from different professions and we need financial help. We've designed the full-scale model and now, we are looking for funds to actualize it. We are hoping to raise $34000 that will cater for:

1: The purchase of parts for the wheelchair from local and abroad

2: Tools and lab setup

3: The actual wheelchair build

4: Rigorous test (up-down stairs test, dummy weight test, speed test, stand-sit test, shallow off-road test, tough off-road test, battery performance test, repeat-ability test and user engagement test)

5: Modifications based on user feedback and test.

6: Further test

7: Final modifications.

8: Registration to the regulatory boards

9: Release it to the market through medical equipment suppliers, wheelchair distributors and wheelchair dealers.

 

What You Get

There are perks which are as follows:

1: Music FreQ-DNA- This is a grand perk since there's no other product like this elsewhere.  It is a lighting device that lights up in sync with music. It is connected to home music systems and it is dependent to music. It simply creates a music driven environment. It offers many colors and patterns, all in sync with music.

2: Personal Monthly Update- This will be done through any of the following: email, skype or facebook.

3: Wheelchair Parts Tagging- This means, the amount you offer will be linked to the part that was purchased with it. A HD image will be sent to you via email showing that part that your funds bought. Some parts will have multiple contributors which is very okay.

4: Live wheelchair test- This will be possible once the wheelchair is up and running. Those who want to be part of the testing crew will have to come to the build station (We will cover accommodation costs only)

5: Each Development stage snapshot- This will be in form of HD photos clearly showing the different stages of the build.

****If we don't achieve the target amount we expect, we will still continue developing it. Personally, I'll do everything to see it out there, transforming the lives of those persons who can't walk or work.****

 

The Impact

This innovation, Smart E-con Wheelchair, will offer the following features:

1. Tackle the stairs.

2. Enable the user to stand while being held on their waist and knees with straps.

3. It will be able to negotiate in tight areas. It can turn 360 at a point.

4. The seat has on on-board auto-balancing system that maintains the user at level at times

4. It has a flexible chassis with unique tri-wheel design that will enable the user to tackle areas without roads (African rural areas)

5. Offer personal physiotherapy to the user.

6. Battery management system that will kill tasks like phone charging or auto-balancing and standing features to ensure they get back home safely.

The advanced versions will have all of the above features plus the following:

1. Sensors and machine learning algorithms that will be monitoring the user and even suggest time to hydrate, time to exercise and much more.

2. Will incorporate mapping system (Will consider to form partnership with Google ATAP on their project Tango) to enable the wheelchair map the user environment and via machine learning, it will get to a point it will be driving the user around the house by use of voice only.

 

Project Value

All of the above features have been carefully considered based on real user experiences and the results will be heart-moving. Your help in this project automatically puts you on the list of people who made change to humanity.

We are all racing to get more, I am that guy who looked back and saw those people who can't race at all. This innovation, this tool, it is what will make them race with us. It will first show them that actually, someone, with the help of many, thought of them with love and compassion. This will build self-esteem and they'll no longer hide at homes, worry about mobility nor independence and they'll be free to pursue their happiness.

 

Risks and Challenges

This innovation is like no other and the challenges are expected to be unique. The build will require a lot of time and heavy mechanical and electrical skills. It will demand software programming skills and they are all expected to work in harmony. Some areas of the wheelchair will experience enormous mechanical stresses and even electrical malfunction.

I have been innovating, creating mechanical stuff since I was 7 years and I've earned the mechanical skills from many areas. I have as well studied electrical and electronics engineering and have made many projects, one of them is in the perk. Here is a link to other innovations I've made https://www.youtube.com/user/Mbiria9700/videos?...  

My team of three has persons who have mastered their skills to the core. Mr. Solomon Mbuthia is an aesthetic designer who has designed several futuristic vehicles, Eng. Maurice Wachihi is an Electrical and Electronics Engineer and software developer and finally, Eng. Charles Wachira is an engineer in the field of electrical and electronics and a software developer.

We will outsource some of the advanced skills (Mostly mechanical materials and manufacturing) to ensure we offer the best of the best.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

There's no problem if you are not able to support financially. You can help with the following:

1. If you want to contribute on the build of this innovation in any way (ideas, test, actual build, design suggestions, your thoughts based on experience, etc), contact US.

2. You can get the word out about this campaign using Indigogo share tools and you'll be part of those who played a role in the build of the wheelchair.

story:
What is Gua Sha?

Gua Sha is a natural therapy that involves gliding a massage tool across your skin to improve circulation. This is an ancient Chinese remedy that has recently gained a lot of attention after some western studies have confirmed its effectiveness.

Who's using it?

Celebrities such as Gwenyth Paltrow and Elle MacPhereson swear by Gua Sha. Massage therapists in China have been using it for centuries and it's recently been gaining traction in western massage therapy.

How does it work?

Recent studies have shown that Gua Sha may improve immune response and have anti-inflammatory effects. A group at Harvard used bioluminescent imaging with a mouse and showed that Gua Sha treatment up-regulates gene expression for an enzyme (oxygenase-1) at multiple organ sites immediately after treatment. This enzyme is an antioxidant and cytoprotectant. 

Historically, Gua Sha has been used to treat many illnesses such as headaches, migraines, various aches and pains (throughout the body) as well as chronic diseases such as hepatitis B (being extensively studied). 

Who is Polar Metals?

In the last few months, with the great help of people like you, we raised over $14,000 here on Indiegogo. We specialize in bringing everyday items to you in unique materials such as Titanium. 

Made of 100% pure Titanium, Polar Gua Sha tool is anti-allergy, durable, and effective. Titanium is the most biocompatible and safe metal for the human body, the only element that your body fully accepts - even bone will grow around it.

The regular tools, such as, plastic, Jade, stone, and stainless steel, are weak, fragile, or easy to get corrosion.  Polar solid Titanium Gua Sha tool is super strong, durable and excellently resistant to corrosion, nearly equivalent to platinum! 

How is it used?

Gua Sha will be most effective when used by a trained practitioner, but you can see benefits with self-use as well. Smooth your skin in an upward fashion, beginning at the lower neck area and allow it to naturally heat. 

It's highly polished by hand and precisely shaped for maximum effectiveness.

Gua Sha can help loosen pain or stiffness in your back, shoulders, facial muscles, neck, arms, thigh, calves, feet, hands and more. 

Every curve of the edge can be used to apply differentiated pressure so that you have just the right amount for the relief you need.

It’s a perfect tool to break up fascial adhesions in your  body, help smooth strained muscles in your neck and back, and break down fatty deposits in the skin. 

Specifications

 

Gua Sha treatment can release unhealthy bodily matter from blood stasis within sore, tired, stiff or injured muscle areas to stimulate new oxygenated blood flow to the areas. This can promote metabolic cell repair, regeneration, healing and recovery. 

How is it made?

Our Gua Sha tool is a single piece of medical-grade titanium that is cut from a larger block of titanium. It's designed to last multiple lifetimes - you'll never need another Gua Sha tool again.

Our goal at Polar Metals is to make quality products that improve your life.

Pledge now and get yours!

story:
About Us and the Oil

This summer, I was offered the chance to try a new olive oil and it had more flavor than I thought possible, having been used to "supermarket" olive oil. My wife and I decided to take the opportunity to bring this wonderful olive oil to share with you, and need some help funding the first shipment over from Spain. We feel that you can find any number of good Italian olive oils here, but it's rare to find premium Spanish oils, and think that you will love Cortijo el Puerto as much as we do.

Our Spanish partner has a young biodiverse farm designed to be in balance with the ecosystem, keeping the olive trees alongside many native plants and the animals that make their habitats there. There are over 12 varieties of olive trees, some of which are still maturing. We will have 5 varieties available to ship this season.

Over the summer, Cortijo el Puerto entered the Israel International Olive Oil Competition and received Gold awards for each of its 6 entries. Earlier in the year, the brand received 2 Gold awards at the New York International Olive Oil Competition for both of its entries. We also know that it's amazing from personal experience!

~Scott

Where are we now?

The 2016 harvest is being bottled as we speak, and will be available to ship within a few weeks. We are asking for $5000 to cover the costs of the oil itself, the shipping, customs, and taxes. We're hoping to be able to order several hundred bottles from our Spanish partners, depending on interest from this campaign.

With each $20 contribution, you will receive a 250 ml bottle of either the Arbequina or Arbosana variety, and for $25 you can opt for the rarer bottles of either the Picual, Picudo, or Koroneiki varieties (supplies are limited).

If we don't reach our funding goal, we will still be importing what we can and everyone who makes a contribution will still get their bottle(s)!

The Impact

Cortijo el Puerto comes from a trailblazing farm that is a significant departure from traditional monoculture-based practices. Engineered with the purpose of contributing to the local ecosystem rather than bulldozing over it, the farm integrates native flora and fauna within the grove to form a coherent biodiverse system. Exemplifying this fact is that each of the varieties of oil is represented by an animal that is found on the farm, from ducks to rabbits to owls. Please help us support them and their novel ecological approach to farming!

Risks & Challenges

While we've started the customs importing process, some unforeseen hangup could cause a slight delay in shipping. However, we're confident that we will work through any problems and get this olive oil shipped promptly to you.

As we'll be shipping the bottles ourselves there is a risk that we could get overwhelmed with demand. That is one of the reasons why we are limiting the number of bottles available this year. With what we learn this year we hope to offer even more varieties next season!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you know someone who loves trying gourmet foods or is just an olive oil aficionado, spread the word!
story_txt:
About Us and the Oil
This summer, I was offered the chance to try a new olive oil and it had more flavor than I thought possible, having been used to "supermarket" olive oil. My wife and I decided to take the opportunity to bring this wonderful olive oil to share with you, and need some help funding the first shipment over from Spain. We feel that you can find any number of good Italian olive oils here, but it's rare to find premium Spanish oils, and think that you will love Cortijo el Puerto as much as we do.
Our Spanish partner has a young biodiverse farm designed to be in balance with the ecosystem, keeping the olive trees alongside many native plants and the animals that make their habitats there. There are over 12 varieties of olive trees, some of which are still maturing. We will have 5 varieties available to ship this season.
Over the summer, Cortijo el Puerto entered the Israel International Olive Oil Competition and received Gold awards for each of its 6 entries. Earlier in the year, the brand received 2 Gold awards at the New York International Olive Oil Competition for both of its entries. We also know that it's amazing from personal experience!
~Scott

Where are we now?
The 2016 harvest is being bottled as we speak, and will be available to ship within a few weeks. We are asking for $5000 to cover the costs of the oil itself, the shipping, customs, and taxes. We're hoping to be able to order several hundred bottles from our Spanish partners, depending on interest from this campaign.
With each $20 contribution, you will receive a 250 ml bottle of either the Arbequina or Arbosana variety, and for $25 you can opt for the rarer bottles of either the Picual, Picudo, or Koroneiki varieties (supplies are limited).
If we don't reach our funding goal, we will still be importing what we can and everyone who makes a contribution will still get their bottle(s)!

The Impact

Engineered with the purpose of contributing to the local ecosystem rather than bulldozing over it, the farm integrates native flora and fauna within the grove to form a coherent biodiverse system. Exemplifying this fact is that each of the varieties of oil is represented by an animal that is found on the farm, from ducks to rabbits to owls. Please help us support them and their novel ecological approach to farming!

story:
The World 1st Organic Vegetable Based Nasal Ointment

Sounds unbelievable? Yes. The therapeutic power of VegiQ Nasal Sinus Ointment stems from organic vegetable extracts, not chemicals, not drugs, and not steroids. These vegetables are proved to be effective to improve respiratory health and help relieve nasal congestion based on extensive research of modern medical studies, our own lab testing and clinical trial results. By leveraging the cutting edge controlled release pharmaceutical technology, optimizing transdermal delivery efficiency, and reducing irritation and sensitivity, we discovered the optimized formula for VegiQ Nasal Sinus Ointment to enhance the delivery of the bioactive ingredients to the targeted respiratory system of suffers. 


What people say about VegiQ Nasal Sinus Ointment

The ointment was originally invented 6 years ago by one of the HomemedLab founders and was exclusively used by her kids. Then little by little, it began to spread to other family members and close friends with sinus congestion due to allergy. It was finally made available to limited public in Jan 2015. Since then, over 500 people from all over the world have tried it. Here are what they say about VegiQ Nasal Sinus Ointment:


Tested in the 1st Allergy Season

HomemedLab has conducted an anonymous survey of VegiQ Nasal Sinus Ointment through surveymonkey.com. Total 57 responses have been collected and over 90% of the people sampled found VegiQ Nasal Sinus Ointment effective in alleviating their nasal and other discomforts.


How can our research help you?

The original motivation of VegiQ research was to provide better care of the founders' own kids and family. As a company, HomemedLab carries on to place safety before anything else. This is why our research is dedicated to innovations of utilizing amazing therapeutic power held in vegetables, fruits, plants, foods and other natural resources. We clearly understand the effectiveness of drugs and medicines. But at the same time, we are aware of the possible side effects and risks of excessive reliance on medicines to human health. Our research is to provide a dependable alternative treatment option and reduce unnecessary use of drugs and medicines. 

VegiQ Nasal Sinus Ointment is our first commercialized product. It serves as a proof-of-concept pioneer. A handful of sister products are in our research pipeline, including VegiQ Cold Sore Gel and VegiQ Acne Control. In an even longer term, the VegiQ Skin Care and Treatment Series is at the early phase of research. HomemedLab will continue to search the nature for answers to harmless health care. 


What are our VegiQ series products?

Same as VegiQ Nasal Sinus Ointment, all our products are Natural and for External Use Only. NO DRUGS, NO STEROIDS, NO ALCOHOL. 

1. Skin Treatment Series

I. Acne Control

It is specially formulated with plant extracts which are proven effective to control acne. It is safe and gentle on the skin, and helps restore normal oil glands on our skin. 

II. Cold Sore Gel

It is made with an unique blend of natural botanical extracts known for its anti-viral properties and for relieving inflammation. 

III. Eczema Control 

It is made of a unique blend of vegetable and grain extracts. Its anti-itching and skin calming features can help alleviate eczema symptoms. It can also help heal damaged skin and promote normal skin growth. It is safe to use on children.

2. Skin Care Series

I. Facial Cleanser

It is extracted from vegetables and fruits. Other than being used as gentle facial cleanser, it could also be applied as a facial mask or used to exfoliate and improve skin health.

II. Facial Nutrition

Perfect nutrient for skin, derived from natural ingredients from vegetable and fruits that contributes to food health. It can naturally promote younger and healthier skin and slow down skin aging. All of our precious ingredients (such as Sea Kelp Extractand Caviar Extract) are imported from countries including Sweden, France, English, Germany, USA, Brazil and etc.

III. Eye Nutrition

Similar ingredients used in facial nutrition are used, but in lighter formula to provide special care for sensitive skin around eyes.

IV. Skin Protection

All natural and safe for all age. It is sesame oil based, made with Zinc Oxide, Beeswax, Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, extracts from Raspberry and Carrot. It naturally helps protect skin from UV damage and can also be an excellent foundation and sunscreen.

How can you help our research?

As a startup, the main challenges HomemedLab faces are how to improve the existing products and invent new products.

The first and foremost risk is the uncertain nature of research. Discovering the right formula is the key to release the power in the natural resource. This requires extensive research, analyzing, experiment design, lab experiments and testing. It impose a serious challenge to both our intelligence and your patience. 

The equally critical challenge is funding. Research and development of innovative therapy requires large investment in lab equipments and raw materials. Moreover, it takes a fortune to transform a lab mature product into a commercial one. Third-party lab certification, manufacturing, and packaging all demands capital expenditure. 

Can we deliver?

With your support, there is virtually no risk of meeting our basic goal : delivering enhanced VegiQ series of products as committed as rewards. The confidence stems from the solid progress in our recent lab development. Our first proof-of-concept product, VegiQ Nasal Sinus Ointment has been listed on Amazon. This gives us some experience in commercial production. 

With your support, we are confident in overcoming the  other challenges. The founders of HomemedLab are a group of senior researchers, experienced marketing executives and Wall Street veterans. The perfect combination of skills and expertise is the ultimate guarantee of great ideas, effective product and healthy growth of the company.

story:
Who we are

Buffs Against Lyme was started by four students in a summer writing class at the University of Colorado at Boulder. We are trying to bring Lyme Disease awareness not only to the CU campus, but also across the whole country. All donations will be donated to the International Lyme and Associated Diseases Society. More information for this organization can be found at:
 http://ilads.org/ilads_media/lyme-challenge/

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to raise at least $500, but no matter the amount we end up raising we will donate to ILADS.

The Impact

Donating to this cause will help train doctors that are capable of correctly diagnosing Lyme. This is a big obstacle that people with Lyme Disease face today. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot make a donation, please like our Facebook page! 

https://www.facebook.com/buffsagainstlymedisease

story:
​

Seaver designs smart equipment for equestrian sports. We are creating the first connected objects dedicated to horse performance and health care.

​​

​


This project is dedicated to those who want to better take care of their horse.

Often there’s a general lack of precise metrics and scientific approach in horse care. Performance training is very subjective, based on the instinct and experience of the breeder, coach or rider. The same goes for the horse’s fitness: constant monitoring and injury prevention issues are becoming more and more important for passionate riders.


Even if the relationship between an owner and their horse is a very close one, animals cannot talk. Therefore, a continuous monitoring of your horse’s health should be a top priority for those who ride and care. Seaver helps to avoid overtraining and to identify health problems as soon as they arise.

With our technology we want to enhance traditional training methods for equestrian sports - attentive riders, coaches and breeders will be able to introduce technology and precise metrics when preparing their training and competitions, all while taking care of their horse’s health.


             


 

The app is conceived for iOS, Android and connected watches, and developed in 3 languages




​To meet the needs of the modern rider, we conceived the Seaver Girth and its “reduced version”, the Seaver Sleeve. The Seaver girth sleeve has exactly the same technological features as the Seaver Girth, therefore providing identical metrics and measurements. 

The Seaver Sleeve is made of modern neoprene fabric and carbon. The Seaver Girth's technology is embedded in a highly designed mix of leather and carbon, handmade in France.

Coupled with our dedicated mobile application, Seaver will allow riders and horse-owners to have:

  • Live streaming of riding data and the horse's vitals
  • Exhaustive post-practice metrics and analysis








For those who wish to keep their old girth, the GIRTH SLEEVE fits all types of girth (anatomical, belly guard, low fits, endurance, western etc.)

For those who want a modern girth with integrated state of the art technology, the Seaver Girth is available in 2 colors: BROWN and BLACK, and in 4 different models:

  • Anatomical fit
  • Low straps anatomical fit
  • Belly guard
  • Low straps belly guard

The girth is also available in 13 sizes:

For the low fits-girths:

{50cm; 55cm; 60cm; 65cm; 70cm}

For the regular fit anatomical and the regular fit bellyguard:

{110cm; 115cm; 120cm; 125cm; 130cm; 135cm; 140cm; 145cm}





Seaver is designed to be easy to use. The materials and technology are innovative, but the design is still that of a cool, classy and traditional girth & girth sleeve.

The rider must simply put the girth on, log in to our app and define the parameters of their horse, and they are good to go!


If the rider wants to live stream their data, they will need a smartphone with them while riding.

Once the training sessions are over, the data will be easily downloadable on your smartphone for a thorough post-exercise analysis.

The data is easily accessible through the Seaver app and is stored indefinitely on our server.

Monitor your horse’s health | Stress Levels


Using an algorithm which combines the heart rate viability, the horse’s movement & respiratory rate, Seaver has a feature which measures your horse's stress levels - imperative for better following your horse's health.

The core technology used for the Seaver Girth consists of a set of position sensors on 9 axes, ECG and respiratory sensors, and a special control unit. 






Our girth is entirely hand-made in France, using French leather and French anti-shock carbon with special attention for the ergonomics. All the materials are top of the range and carefully crafted to produce a high-quality girth. The girth sleeve is also hand-made in France with neoprene, to assure comfort and prevent any friction. 



Seaver was founded by Zakaria, a passionate horse rider and former semi-professional rider trained by a TOP30 international champion. He graduated from the HEC Business School in Paris and became director of the Hello Tomorrow Challenge, a global start-up competition focused on science, technology and entrepreneurship. His passion for innovation lead him to explore the world of connected objects and the new frontiers in the Internet of Things. As a rider, he has long identified the need for more precision in the practice of equestrian sports.

Zak launched an evaluation phase, interviewing experts from both the tech and equestrian world, and began to work on the concept and long-term vision of the project.

Once he met Pierre-Yves, now the CTO of Seaver, he saw the right co-founder to launch the company and begin the prototype phase with. Pierre-Yves comes from a previous successful experience as an embedded software and hardware engineer.

Seaver partnered with Remy Trappier and Anass El Mahi, two design artists who worked both on the industrial and communication design elements.

Today the core team consists of 8 people, with a good mix between business and technical expertise, coupled with a deep knowledge of horse riding.

We work to improve the tracking of horses’ performance and health, and we do it because we love horses, we love riding them, and we see technology as a precious ally to our favourite animal!





Seaver has been designed by loving riders, for loving riders. We are continuously testing our prototypes to improve each component, while also focusing on the ergonomics to ensure the horse's comfort. We rely on expert manufacturers who have worked with top-level French horse equipment providers.


We took on some “extreme users” for our tests, especially in the jumping discipline; soon we will tackle some advanced tests also for the horse racing disciplines. We want our innovation to be of use for all equestrian and horse racing sports.

Our app is being developed with all types of riders in mind and is conceived to be extremely user friendly. We hope you will love it! 









The coach and the veterinarian are crucial partners for taking good care of the horse and in preparing competitions.

We envision riders sharing their training results with their coaches through our app, giving a new edge to the training process and taking health monitoring to the next level.


The Seaver sensors are capable of detecting anomalies in your horse's condition, making it possible to immediately detect possible health problems and notifying the rider, who can then contact a veterinarian before potential damages worsen or the pain becomes more acute.





Seaver wants to help trainers, coaches and riders with metrics and measurements, hoping to promote a more scientific approach in horse riding.

That is why we developed a series of calculations, simplified in one view on our application, that will allow you to measure the intensity of your training, distinguishing the periods when you simply burned calories, when you ameliorated the cardio of your horse, and when you worked at high intensity.

Furthermore, studying the variability of your horse’s heart frequency in respect to other variables such as the average gallop speed, will show your horse condition at a specific time. Thanks to a simplified data view on the Seaver app, you will be able to benchmark more precisely your horse’s condition and better prepare it for the next competition.

Seaver is the first ever smart wearable that truly combine Heart Rate measurement with the locomotion, speed and movement of your horse giving an unprecedented insight of your horse fitness level.

Here is an example of the work we have done to filter and interpret the signals, bringing you a clear view of your horse heart rate.




Seaver stocks your raw data on our server, allowing for more advanced analysis in the future and comparison over different periods. The more the Seaver app is used, the more precise it will become and the more useful its analysis will be for the user. Statistical relevance will also increase with increased data, improving precision and benchmarking possibilities even further.


Here is our timeline for the Seaver production:


  

The product is the combination of different sensors, integrated in a state-of-the-art piece of equipment. Here are some of the basic components:

  • Microcontroller with a memory card to reprocess the data in real time
  • Inertial unit with a 9-axis accelerometer, a magnetometer and a gyroscope needed for movement, strides and jumps
  • Heart rate and breathing sensors for measuring health data
  • Bluetooth Low Energy used for the transmission of real-time data and commands
  • Lithium-ion battery
  • A flash memory
  • A little magic from our engineers



  


Come and meet us during events, we'd love to see you in person and show you our products!

If you are attending an important international equestrian gathering, message us on Facebook or via contact@seaverhorse.com and check if we or one of our Ambassadors will be there.

That’s right, we have an amazing community of Ambassadors all over the world. To know more about our ambassador programme or to become an ambassador visit our website www.seaverhorse.com



There has been a lot of enthusiasm for our project, both from our team and those who help us. We want to thank all of our partners who contribute with resources and advice (some of them are top secret!)






This project comes from the heart of the founders and the whole team. We thank all those who supported us, our partners, our Ambassadors and all of our backers!

Also a big shout out to: Thomas Dufour, a young but very talented film maker, Catherine and Emmanuel our first mentors in the horse industry, Marie for the wonderful British voice, AIFCC Caen and ECE Paris students, Usine.io, Benjamin Joffe of HAX, our selected testers, Roger-Yves Bost, Abdelkebir Ouaddar, HEC Alumni network, our families and to all those who helped us so far and will continue to support us!

Pierre-Yves comes from a previous successful experience as an embedded software and hardware engineer.Seaver partnered with Remy Trappier and Anass El Mahi, two design artists who worked both on the industrial and communication design elements.Today the core team consists of 8 people, with a good mix between business and technical expertise, coupled with a deep knowledge of horse riding.We work to improve the tracking of horses’ performance and health, and we do it because we love horses, we love riding them, and we see technology as a precious ally to our favourite animal!Seaver has been designed by loving riders, for loving riders. We are continuously testing our prototypes to improve each component, while also focusing on the ergonomics to ensure the horse's comfort. We rely on expert manufacturers who have worked with top-level French horse equipment providers.We took on some “extreme users” for our tests, especially in the jumping discipline; soon we will tackle some advanced tests also for the horse racing disciplines. We want our innovation to be of use for all equestrian and horse racing sports.Our app is being developed with all types of riders in mind and is conceived to be extremely user friendly. We hope you will love it! The coach and the veterinarian are crucial partners for taking good care of the horse and in preparing competitions.We envision riders sharing their training results with their coaches through our app, giving a new edge to the training process and taking health monitoring to the next level.The Seaver sensors are capable of detecting anomalies in your horse's condition, making it possible to immediately detect possible health problems and notifying the rider, who can then contact a veterinarian before potential damages worsen or the pain becomes more acute.Seaver wants to help trainers, coaches and riders with metrics and measurements, hoping to promote a more scientific approach in horse riding.That is why we developed a series of calculations, simplified in one view on our application, that will allow you to measure the intensity of your training, distinguishing the periods when you simply burned calories, when you ameliorated the cardio of your horse, and when you worked at high intensity.Furthermore, studying the variability of your horse’s heart frequency in respect to other variables such as the average gallop speed, will show your horse condition at a specific time. Thanks to a simplified data view on the Seaver app, you will be able to benchmark more precisely your horse’s condition and better prepare it for the next competition.Seaver is the first ever smart wearable that truly combine Heart Rate measurement with the locomotion, speed and movement of your horse giving an unprecedented insight of your horse fitness level.Here is an example of the work we have done to filter and interpret the signals, bringing you a clear view of your horse heart rate.Seaver stocks your raw data on our server, allowing for more advanced analysis in the future and comparison over different periods. The more the Seaver app is used, the more precise it will become and the more useful its analysis will be for the user. Statistical relevance will also increase with increased data, improving precision and benchmarking possibilities even further.Here is our timeline for the Seaver production:  The product is the combination of different sensors, integrated in a state-of-the-art piece of equipment. Here are some of the basic components:

Microcontroller with a memory card to reprocess the data in real time


Inertial unit with a 9-axis accelerometer, a magnetometer and a gyroscope needed for movement, strides and jumps


Heart rate and breathing sensors for measuring health data


Bluetooth Low Energy used for the transmission of real-time data and commands


Lithium-ion battery


A flash memory


A little magic from our engineers

  Come and meet us during events, we'd love to see you in person and show you our products!If you are attending an important international equestrian gathering, message us on Facebook or via contact@seaverhorse.com and check if we or one of our Ambassadors will be there.That’s right, we have an amazing community of Ambassadors all over the world. To know more about our ambassador programme or to become an ambassador visit our website www.seaverhorse.com

There has been a lot of enthusiasm for our project, both from our team and those who help us. We want to thank all of our partners who contribute with resources and advice (some of them are top secret!)This project comes from the heart of the founders and the whole team. We thank all those who supported us, our partners, our Ambassadors and all of our backers!Also a big shout out to: Thomas Dufour, a young but very talented film maker, Catherine and Emmanuel our first mentors in the horse industry, Marie for the wonderful British voice, AIFCC Caen and ECE Paris students, Usine.io, Benjamin Joffe of HAX, our selected testers, Roger-Yves Bost, Abdelkebir Ouaddar, HEC Alumni network, our families and to all those who helped us so far and will continue to support us!

story:
Short Summary

  • We are the Michigan Association of Naturopathic Physicians and we are writing to request your support for legislation that will allow for licensure of Naturopathic physicians in the state of Michigan.
  • In 2015, the Michigan Association of Naturopathic Physicians (MANP) introduced House Bill 4531 into the House of Representatives Health Policy Committee. This bill will allow for licensure of naturopathic physicians in the state of Michigan.
  • Licensure is important to us & Michigan residents because States that license naturopathic physicians allow the health care consumer access to physician-level, safe, effective, evidence-based natural health care. 
  • Licensure would also set standards for education of NDs and restrict the title "naturopathic doctor and naturopathic physician" to those licensed practitioners trained at institutions accredited by the U.S. Department of Education.
  • By contributing to our licensure efforts you are taking part of a much needed change in our healthcare system: An opportunity to choose your primary care provider!

What We Need & How You Can Help

Excited to be a part of our cause? Here is how you can help:

DONATE MONEY: Help us reach our $5000 goal so we can continue to have enough funds to lobby for our cause!

BECOME A CORPORATE SPONSOR: Visit www.michnd.org and click on the'Corporate Sponsorship' link, under the 'Become A Corporate Sponsor' box at the bottom of the home page, to download a corporate sponsorship packet.

DONATE TIME: Volunteer to help us in our quest to bring a safer, more effective healthcare alternative to your community.

DONATE RESOURCES: Do you have access to resources that would further our cause?

SPREAD THE WORD: Tell everyone you know – family, friends, and colleagues – and get them involved in this important cause.

SPEAK YOUR MIND: Contact your representatives and discuss the importance of licensure of Naturopathic Medicine for the benefit of your family and community. 

The Impact
Naturopathic Physicians are the leading experts and specialists in natural medicine. Licensure will benefit the public health by providing expertise in the areas of drug-dietary supplement interactions, dietary supplement safety and efficacy issues, and the appropriate use of evidence based complementary therapies. It would also give YOU a benchmark by which to choose safe, qualified practitioners. Finally it would allow greater collaboration between medical/osteopathic and naturopathic physicians.

Risks & Challenges

Our challenge at the moment is simply raising enough money so that we can continue to have a voice & push for our bill to be passed.

story:
Healthcare system in Armenia cannot be considered one of the best in the world. But yet it is true, that here in Armenia we have top class professionals.  However, guess what, it is still a challenge for people to get quality treatment and good medical services. People have little trust for doctors. But this shouldn't be this way and we are going to change it.

We are developers from Armenia having almost 10 years of experience in this field. We have enough knowledge and will to put our experience in establishing a better healthcare system in Armenia.  

We are not paid for our commitment to this project. We invest our spare time, weekends and our limited resources into it. We need your help to develop and keep this project live.

The first step towards our goal was to create a system, where patients can share their experiences with doctors: do they care about them? How well do they explain the problem to a patient? Has the patient got treated as a result and whether it was affordable.

You may argue that patients’ reviews are subjective and will not reflect the reality. We do agree that reviews are subjective and reflect a particular patient experience, but having lots of review data, along with other ranking criteria lets us develop algorithms, which are used to rank doctors.

What We Need

Being online for about 6 month (with www.ratemydoc.am domain and afterwards as www.topdoctors.am), we have assessed the system, how people use our service, and have come to conclusion that we have really created something that is truly useful for patients. Now we get an average of 50 reviews per month. 

We want to accelerate our growing. The faster we grow, the easier it becomes for patients to find qualified doctors.

With the raised funds we would like to make:

  • A broader audience, who will know what we do and what impact it can have on them
  • Fund our development costs (hire a junior developer)
  • Create a mobile application for IOS and Android (counting on a friend of mine, so don't expect to waste funds here)
  • Film a social advertisement encouraging people to give feedback about the quality of healthcare they got
  •  Air that via mass media, TV, Radio and social networks (this is the most expensive part )

We will have a dedicated place to report about every penny that will be spent from your funds.

The Future

Providing tools for mass quality control of healthcare system, next we aim to implement new technologies in the following areas:

  • Create and maintain doctor online appointment system
  • Eliminate endless queues at gynecologic cabinets
  • Provide tools for users to create and maintain their online medical cards, main analyses statistics, which they can share with doctors if needed

Risks & Challenges

Creating a system, which will make good professionals stand out and the bad ones go into shadow, is full of challenges, as the success of this project can be put at risk by those "bad guys", who may have big connections in the government.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please like us on Facebook, share this project among your friends and spread the word about www.topdoctors.am.

story:
Resistimos en comunidad

Somos dos jóvenes puertorriqueños que, ante la realidad actual, decidimos regresar al campo. En los pasados años hemos estado involucrados en diversas áreas de la labor comunitaria y eso nos afirma la necesidad de re-ocupar los suelos de nuestra tierra para alimentar, sanar y educar.

Finca La Resistencia es parte de una iniciativa, desde el corazón, que nace para viabilizar un espacio en donde podamos regresar al centro y desde allí gestar un proyecto multidisciplinario de rescate a los elementos básicos de nuestra humanidad. Con este fin, actualmente estamos finalizando los tramites para la compra de una finca desde donde podamos desarrollar los tres ejes de La Resistencia y allí habilitar un espacio de educación y salud. Actualmente el terreno que queremos esta en una loma en el pueblo de Orocovis. Este lugar desde donde gestaremos el proyecto Finca La Resistencia busca proveer una plataforma ecológica de sustentabilidad alimentaria en resistencia ante el momento que atravesamos las y los que habitamos Puerto Rico.  Entendemos que en el escenario económico actual del país hacer este tipo de donaciones es complejo, pero a la misma vez reconocemos que hay que dar la lucha. Es por esa lucha que comenzamos con el proceso de la compra del terreno; por tanto necesitaremos apoyo con los gastos de cierre y con el capital semilla para dar vida a Finca La Resistencia. 
 
¿Como colaborar?
 

Actualmente necesitamos $10,000, de los cuales $5,000 serán para gastos de cierre. Los otros $5,000 se utilizarán para comenzar a gestar el proyecto socio-educativo de Finca La Resistencia.

Cada donación es importante para nosotros, es por esto que hemos detallado abajo los tipos de donativos y el intercambio sugerido basado en los tres pilares del proyecto -salud, alimento y educación- :

$25.00 = Obsequiaremos un pan vegano de guineo, nueces y crema de almendros

$50.00 = Dibujo original en pequeño formato de Rubén Rolando  

$75.00= Sobada Maya (desintoxicación del drenaje linfático) o Plan semanal de limpieza por medio de smoothies o batidos nutricionales
$100.00= Cena de 4 cursos para dos en Finca La Resistencia en Orocovis
$150.00= Taller de Salud Sexual Integral 
+$200.00= *Acuerdos de intercambio*
Es importante recalcar que cada donativo cuenta. Si interesas donar pero entiende que las categorías que preparamos no están entre tus necesidades actuales, también podemos ofrecer alternativas que se acoplen a ti.  Solo nos dejas saber. Estamos abiertos a colaborar y a co-crear.

Nosotrxs

A continuación nos presentaremos, no en ánimos biográficos sino para que vayan conociendo un poco quienes son los gestores de Finca La Resistencia.

Yo soy Carlo. 


Me crié en Manatí, Puerto Rico. Desde el año 2008, cuando entré a la Universidad de Puerto Rico en Rio Piedras a estudiar psicología, comencé a trabajar en una Clínica que ofrece servicios de prevención y tratamiento a personas con VIH, y ahí básicamente comenzó todo. Por los pasados 7 años me he dedicado a un sin numero de labores dentro del campo de la salud. Desde trabajar alcance comunitario y hacer pruebas de VIH con grupos socialmente marginados,  hasta desarrollar programas de servicio, intervenciones e investigación a nivel comunitario a través del Caribe con un enfoque en el acceso a tratamiento de VIH. Tanto la labor en Puerto Rico,República Dominicana, Haití, Jamaica, el resto de América Latina  me ha llevado a comprender mejor el lugar que ocupo como ser humano sobre la tierra y a buscar nuevas formas de interactuar que nos permitan desarrollar mejores estrategias para vivir. He librado luchas tanto en espacios comunitarios a nivel nacional como a nivel internacional por el reconocimiento de nuestros derechos humanos y por el acceso digno y justo a tratamientos de salud, siempre con el enfoque de que las personas vamos primero que cualquier capital. Hoy todas estas experiencias me han traido a un lugar en donde siento que es el momento de gestar espacios de sanación y resistencia donde entre todxs construyamos nuevas realidades que nos permitan colectivamente trabajar en el planeta. La realidad mundial puede ser hermosa pero  asi mismo puede ser veces volatil, desoladora e individualista. Vivir debe ser un ejercicio digno no de represión.

Soy Rubén Rolando;


Desde la infancia me he desenvuelto en multiples áreas del quehacer cultural y artististico. Estudié en la Escuela de Artes Plasticas de Puerto Rico escultura, fotografía, video arte y pintura. En todos mis proyectos de clases auscultaba teorias filosoficas sobre sustentabilidad del ser en el medio ambiente y la existencia de la vida en sí; de ahí mi interes por el cuerpo humano y los procesos de sanacíon. No fue hasta que comencé a facilitar talleres creativos de inteligencias emocionales a niñas y niños en varios proyectos comunitarios que comencé a concebir el arte como algo proactivo y a favor de la sociedad; el arte como un lenguaje para la concientización colectiva y la sanación personal. Desarrollé curriculos educativos basados en arte terapia, que le permitieran al participante verse a sí mismo de forma integral, reconociendo su contexto, su historia y su medio ambiente, como un todo. Desde entonces he tenido la oportunidad de colaborar, como artista o escritor, como gestor cultural o como educador, con diversas movimientos y organizaciones de base comunitaria, logrando intercambiar saberes y generar diversos proyectos tanto a nivel nacional como internacional en países como Cuba, Rep. Dominicana, Haiti y Brasil. Hoy realizo una maestria en Ciencias Naturopaticas con el proposito de continuar aportando a los procesos de sanación por medio de la medicina natural y el arte, socializando el conocimiento y promoviendo desde el autocuidado y la educación la conexión con la naturaleza para el bienestar individual y colectivo. 
Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar 

Sabemos que precisamente en el proceso de resistencia por el que actualmente pasamos todas y todos no siempre hay dinero. No obstante cualquier ayuda es bienvenida. Si no puedes aportar económicamente, por favor comparte este llamado en tus redes y haz que crezca esta red de apoyo. Les seremos eternamente agradecidos. 

Con mucha fuerza y cariño

Carlo y Rubén

story:
Swannies Model X Blue Light Blocking Glasses improve the quality of your sleep by filtering out harmful artificial blue light from electronic devices that shut down your body’s natural melatonin production and disrupts your sleep. Swannies also prevent eye damage from excessive screen use as well as symptoms of digital eye strain such as sore eyes, headaches, and fatigue.


End Tossing and Turning for Good

 

Whether you have trouble falling asleep,  toss and turn in the night, or you wake up exhausted, the Swannies Model X are scientifically proven to improve the quality of your sleep.
 

 

What is Blue Light?

 


Innovative lenses filter out blue light on the visible wavelength spectrum that has been proven to disrupt sleep. The lenses allow all other light to be transmitted, leaving you free to watch TV and use electronic devices without negatively affecting your body clock.

The health risks of excessive blue light exposure at night include metabolic disease & diabetes, weight gain & obesity, stress, anxiety and other mental disorders, as well as certain cancers.
 

 

A Simple Solution to a Chronic Problem

 

 

Wear them 1-2 hours before bed and the Swannies Model X will block harmful blue light emitted from your smartphones, tablets and artificial light, allowing you to have measurably improved sleep in as little as a few days.

This ridiculously simple, safe and easy solution to blue light overexposure isn’t just proven, it’s got big names willing to attach their names to it, and more press than you can shake a stick at.
 

 

 

 


 

 

 

 

Phone addiction is one thing, but what if you just work really hard? Who can’t relate to losing sleep now and again? Hopefully, it’s never for long - but 1-in-5 of us suffer from anxiety. One of the main side effects of that anxiety is insomnia.

And one of the key “remedies” for insomnia? Pulling out your phone, or turning on the lights, or watching TV so that you can do something so you can tire yourself out. Hellooooooo, blue light

.

 

J. Fox | Amazon Verified Purchase

K. Tsuboyama | Amazon Verified Purchase

 

We’re so popular in the sleep space that we’ve got experts the world over in top positions in some of the leading health institutions using our Swannies blue light blocking glasses. We are truly a name you can trust.

  

 

 

New to Indiegogo? Here's How You Pre-Order
 

 

 

Swanwick Sleep was founded in 2015 by Australian brothers, James and Tristan Swanwick.

Their mother, Jill, was proud. 

James used to have bad sleep that he thought may have been a mental disorder because he was up all night tossing and turning. Tristan’s poor sleep made him irritable during the day. (James nods here.) He also had low energy.

Then, James discovered this thing called “blocking blue light.” He noticed there was a handful of blue light blocking options on the market including safety goggles with a yellow lens, ski goggles, and protective glasses.

But they were all ugly. James is pretty vain. He didn’t want to wear them. And he later discovered the options on the market didn’t block enough blue light responsible for disrupting sleep. So James decided to make a pair of stylish blue light blocking glasses. 

He phoned up Tristan and said, “Hey, little brother! I have an idea to make a stylish pair of blue light blocking glasses! You want to help me?” (What're little brothers for?) The brothers spent nine months researching blue light and trying to produce the perfect orange lens, that actually worked. They also searched for the most stylish frames to house the blue-light blocking technology. (So James could try to look cool. ?)

In November 2015, they launched their sleep company, Swanwick Sleep and their blue light blocking glasses.Today, more than 35,000 happy customers have slept better because of Swannies blue light blocking glasses. 



Risks and Challenges
 

While we’re experienced in bringing various types of products to market, manufacturing and international shipping can be unpredictable.

Swannies Blue Light Blocking Glasses are hand-assembled by an expert team of workers who take pride in their craftsmanship and won’t compromise on quality.

The process can’t be rushed! 

And international shipping is a highly complex and unpredictable undertaking involving dozens of couriers, trucking companies, airlines, customs inspectors, more trucking companies, more couriers and even the humble postman. 

Luckily we have an amazing team who are helping us build Swannies Model X to the highest standards and an expert logistics team who can overcome any challenge.
 

Frequently Asked Questions
 

Q. What do Swannies Blue Light Blocking Glasses Do?
A. Swannies Blue Light Blocking Glasses improve the quality of your sleep by filtering out harmful artificial blue light from electronic devices that shut down your body’s natural melatonin production and disrupts your sleep. Swannies also prevent eye damage from excessive screen use as well as symptoms of digital eye strain such as sore eyes, headaches, and fatigue.

Q. How do Swannies Blue Light Blocking glasses work?
A. Innovative lenses filter out the blue light on the visible wavelength spectrum that has been proven to disrupt sleep. The lenses allow all other light to be transmitted, leaving you free to watch TV and use electronic devices without negatively affecting your body clock.

Q. Why is the lens orange? Is it available in other colors?
A. The lens is orange to help filter out the harmful blue light. This is the only color that is effective.

Q. Swanwick Sleep is registered with the FDA. What does that mean?
A. Swanwick Sleep is fully registered and authorized by the FDA to import and distribute medical devices in the USA and all our products are FDA compliant.

Q. When should I wear them?
A. We recommend wearing Swannies Blue Light Blocking Glasses any time you are using digital devices such as phones, tablets, computers or TVs for extended periods. This will prevent digital eye strain. We strongly recommend wearing your Swannies at least one hour before bed to stop artificial blue light disrupting your sleep. Some customers report better results putting the glasses on even earlier before bed.

Q. What's the difference between the Swannies Model X and your Swannies Classic?
A. Swannies Model X is the latest in eyewear offering you the same blue light blocking lenses with a new stylish clear frame.

Q. Do you offer different sizes?
A. Swannies Model X is a one-size-fits-all model. If you are anything less than 100% satisfied, we offer a money back guarantee.

Q. When will the Swannies Model X ship out?
A. The first 200 Early Bird orders will ship out around August of this year, with all remaining orders shipping out around October of this year.

Q. What is the shipping cost?
A. The shipping is $6 for U.S. orders, $12 to Canada and E.U., and $20 for the rest of the world.

Q. Do you have a guarantee?
A. Absolutely. We stand firmly behind our product and offer a 100% money back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, just tell us! We'll make it right.

Q. Will the Swannies Model X become a regular version, or will it only be for Indiegogo?
A. Right now, our plan is to have a successful launch on Indiegogo. If you want the stylish Model X on your face, get it here.

Can't find what you're looking for? 

Email support@swanwicksleep.com

End Tossing and Turning for Good

What is Blue Light?

The health risks of excessive blue light exposure at night include metabolic disease & diabetes, weight gain & obesity, stress, anxiety and other mental disorders, as well as certain cancers. 


 
A Simple Solution to a Chronic Problem
 

 
Wear them 1-2 hours before bed and the Swannies Model X will block harmful blue light emitted from your smartphones, tablets and artificial light, allowing you to have measurably improved sleep in as little as a few days.
This ridiculously simple, safe and easy solution to blue light overexposure isn’t just proven, it’s got big names willing to attach their names to it, and more press than you can shake a stick at. 

 
 

 
 

 
 


 
Phone addiction is one thing, but what if you just work really hard? Who can’t relate to losing sleep now and again? Hopefully, it’s never for long - but 1-in-5 of us suffer from anxiety. One of the main side effects of that anxiety is insomnia.
And one of the key “remedies” for insomnia? Pulling out your phone, or turning on the lights, or watching TV so that you can do something so you can tire yourself out. Hellooooooo, blue light
.
