story:
The Waveblade Sports Roller is a durable, versatile, and highly effective sports massage product that dramatically improves the way athletes address their preparation and recovery sessions, enhancing athletic potential.

Compared to existing foam roller solutions, the Waveblade represents a transformational innovation, delivering big benefits to both amateur and professional athletes alike.

The current products on the market were all too similar. They didn't address our needs as coaches and therapists, or the needs of our athletes.

Our goal was to solve common issues our athletes were facing by creating a product that provided:

  • An intelligent new way to target all areas of the body
  • Innovative design that enhances circulation and hydration
  • A smart product that interacts safely with the body and spine
  • A new approach inspired by sports and massage therapists
  • Built in trigger caps for hard to reach tension points
  • Strong and durable, won't break down like foam rollers
  • A consistent pressure to prevent adaptation and desensitisation
  • A compact product that fits in gym bags or hand luggage easily
  • A smart and easily accessible education platform
  • Applied evidence based research


The Waveblade sports roller is the first sports massage tool that accurately and effectively targets all areas of the body. 

 


The patent-pending Waveblade pattern is designed to safely and effectively create a high-to-low varying pressure system, that allows for the maximum amount of blood to reach tight and damaged muscles, to enhance tissue hydration and speed recovery after exercise.

 

The centre blades of the Waveblade are precisely designed to engage the back muscles and fascia located on either side of the spine, improving spinal mobility and posture. 

 

The Waveblade’s multiple contact points stretch muscles and fascia (connective tissue) in multiple and opposing directions simultaneously, providing a more effective release. This is a highly effective technique used by sports therapists.

 

The Waveblade's two Trigger-Caps provide athletes and therapists complete control, allowing them to target hard-to-reach tension points and regulate pressure accordingly.

 

 Easy to hold or to place on the floor, Trigger-Caps won't roll away and move out of the desired position like massage balls do.

Each Trigger-Cap has a different shape to uniquely target different parts of the body. The small Trigger-Cap targets muscles such as the gluteal group and hip flexors.

The large Trigger-Cap targets hard to reach muscles such as the pectoralis and sternocleidomastoid (SCM) upper chest and neck groups.

Additionally, the trigger caps also clip into place, providing a discrete storage space for valuables whilst training, or in transit.


The Waveblade has been precision engineered to be strong, durable and compact. Allowing it to withstand the heavy loads and repetitive use of intense training schedules.

The blades themselves are made of a silicon compound that won’t break down like foam rollers do. This provides a constant reliable pressure for athletes, encourages consistent mobility gains, and avoids muscular adaptation (elasticity) and desensitisation (receptors).

 


Fits neatly into gym bag, hand luggage or suitcase, for athletes on the move. Your mobile massage therapist.


With innovation, comes new education - We have developed the Release Move Improve education system and created an online exercise library to ensure the latest techniques and concepts are easily accessible to all Waveblade users.

 

 

  • Improve Performance
  • Enhance Recovery
  • Strong and Durable
  • Compact and Portable
  • Targets All Areas of the Body 
  • Release Tight Muscles


 


Matt Waterton and Choppy Somjee are the co-founders of Waveblade. Together they have more than 25 years experience in sports coaching, strength and conditioning, and injury rehabilitation.

They first met in Bondi, Sydney in 2013, having both studied extensively under the FMS system, and shared similar philosophies around movement, training, and physical therapy.

Prior to moving to Australia, Englishman Matt and Choppy, who hails from Canada, had suffered major injuries that heavily disrupted their own sporting ambitions – Choppy in triathlon and Matt in snowboarding. They worked hard in rehab to get back to full fitness and educated themselves throughout the process. Through their own respective recovery journeys, they discovered the Self Myofascial Release (SMR) tools available on the market, and quickly realised that these products did not meet their needs.

They found that their bodies adapted too easily to soft products, making them less effective over time. Durability was also an issue as most of the reinforced products on the market broke apart after only a few weeks of intense use. Additionally they had to buy multiple products to do the job, as there was no ‘all-in-one’ solution that targeted all problem areas of the body. Looking to achieve an improved solution for themselves and both amateur and professional athletes alike, the Waveblade was born.

Matt Waterton has worked in sports coaching, strength and conditioning, and corrective exercise for more than 15 years, After many years traveling and working within the winter sports industry, he returned to the UK to work in strength and conditioning with professional soccer teams, athletes and corporate clients. Since 2009, he has been based in Sydney specialising in injury rehab, injury prevention, and strength and conditioning programs.

Choppy Somjee has been a triathlete, strength and conditioning coach, and remedial massage therapist in both Canada and Australia. He runs a sports injury recovery clinic in Byron Bay, where he combines and applies the disciplines of therapy, nutrition, strength and conditioning to his clients. He is also completing his MA. in Osteopathic Medicine.

 

Every tool and stamp has been completed, and production samples have been produced.  We are now officially in production and eagerly awaiting our first production run to be completed and shipped!

 

Risks and Challenges

We all know problems can happen, how ever much you try to avoid them, the unexpected is never far away, this is a large part of the product development game.This is why we have spent the last 3 years, developing and refining our product. We have prototyped and tested extensively, to reduce any risk of unforseen issues in the manufacturing process.

.Our years of experience in the industry have driven our vision for a high performance product and supporting education system. We have tried and tested the product on ourselves as well as on a variety of different high performance athletes, to ensure it meets up to ours, and their high standards.

Our engineering team also have vast experience in product development and manufacturing processes. They have forged strong relationships with high quality factories, suppliers and distributors, over their 20+ year career.

We have also ensured our IP is fully protected by lodging Patent and trademark applications globally.

We are a new company made up of a group of highly experienced professionals, all with different essential skill sets to drive this project towards its completion. This is our primary focus, and as our flagship product, the Waveblade has our full attention.

story:
MEET THE WORLD'S NEWEST 

CALORIE COUNTER

A simple app designed to make weight loss easy! 

  1. Take our smart survey to determine your weight loss goals
  2. Search and select the foods you want to eat
  3. CalorieWiz will calculate your portions for you to meet your goals
  4. Lose weight! 

 

CAPTIVATING DESIGN

WITH LARGE DATABASE

 

NO MORE MATH

Don't waste time trying to figure out how much you should eat. CalorieWiz will calculate the portions for your meals so you can stay on track! It's that simple!

 

WIZ'S PICKS

If you don't know where to start, don't worry - there are over 160 healthy meals for your convenience, including fast food options. These were handpicked by our fitness professionals to help you! Select a suggested meal, and CalorieWiz will calculate the portions specific to your weight loss goals! 

 

MACRONUTRIENTS

Do you like to follow a specific macronutrient breakdown? CalorieWiz allows you to customize your macronutrient goals that will best suit you OR you can choose to follow the recommended breakdown. Monitor your progress in the dashboard and as the rings fill up, you're that much closer to meeting your goals!                

 

ALLOCATE CALORIES

CalorieWiz will allocate your calories based on your weight loss goals. You can change this to your liking. Your weight achievements have never been easier! Monitor your calorie intake from your dashboard. 

 

NO DUPLICATES

We know you LOVE eating, so why stop eating all the foods you love? With over 750,000 foods to choose from, our database is full of the foods you're looking for without duplicate entry items!

 

MADE JUST FOR YOU

Our fast and easy survey will allow you to eat all the foods you love AND stay on track with your weight loss journey.

 

TESTIMONIALS

Sabrina started using CalorieWiz after her first pregnancy, where she gained 65 pounds. She could not imagine how she was going to get back to her pre-baby weight, but SHE DID! CalorieWiz was quick and easy for her to use, all she had to do was tell CalorieWiz what she wanted to eat, and it told her how much of each item. Her favourite features are the barcode scanner and Wiz's Picks. 

 

Jennifer has lost 16 pounds using CalorieWiz. She started using CalorieWiz as a way to stay active, lose weight and become a healthier person. It is easy and fun for Jennifer to use on a daily basis. She enjoys that it allows her to eat the foods she loves, without having to cut out sugars or carbs, but rather help her portion them out! 

 

Jane started using CalorieWiz a few months ago and was able to lose 17 pounds. She finds CalorieWiz user friendly and the app helps her control her portions. She is able to eat anything she wants. It's not only for people looking to lose weight, but great for maintaining your weight too! 

 

 

 

HOW CALORIEWIZ WORKS

Search. Select. CalorieWiz will do the rest!
 

 

Wiz's Picks: Quick and Easy

 

 

 

 CALORIEWIZ COMPARISON

 

HOW IT ALL STARTED

Mark, creator and co-founder of CalorieWiz, started his weight loss journey 7 years ago, when he weighed 222lbs. He mapped out his weight loss plan, which consisted of 30-40 minutes of exercise 5 times per week and only eating healthy foods. He noticed that his weight loss was minimal, with only 4-5 pounds in the first month.

He soon discovered that it wasn’t the quality of food you put in your body, it’s calories in vs. calories out that achieves your weight loss goals.

Mark decided to count calories and no longer follow a restrictive diet. The results were immediate, within the first 2 weeks, he was able to lose 5 lbs, and in total lost 52 lbs.

He was asked how he lost his weight, and he responded "it’s simple, calories in vs. calories out. Start logging and measuring your foods and you will achieve the same outcome." Many people started but gave up quickly due to complicated databases, not knowing what to eat and the amount of time and effort it takes to plan your day around eating. 

All this led to creating the world's newest and most revolutionary weight loss app, called CalorieWiz, that counts calories for you!

 

 

INDIEGOGO SPECIAL

 

   

   

 

 

 

DEVELOPMENT TIMELINE

 

HELP OUT

BY SHARING WITH FRIENDS

Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend who would benefit from CalorieWiz!
We can't do this without  you! THANK YOU! 

 

 

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

How does CalorieWiz work?

CalorieWiz makes losing weight easier by calculating portions for you by using the following steps:

  1.  Select the meal you want to add food to
  2. Search and select foods you want to eat
  3. CalorieWiz will calculate the portions for you
  4. Eat!

Am I able to change my settings after signup? 

Yes!

  1. Tap the menu icon at the top left corner
  2. Select Settings
  3. From here you can change any of the settings from when you signed up

How are calories calculated?

CalorieWiz uses the Harris Benedict Equation to calculate your basal metabolic rate (BMR). Your basal metabolic rate is the amount of calories needed if you were to lay around with no energy expenditure. The Harris Benedict Equation uses your BMR and applies the activity level (energy expenditure) that best describes your lifestyle to determine your daily caloric maintenance level (the amount of calories to consume to maintain your current weight). CalorieWiz uses this to calculate the amount of calories to consume in order to hit your goal! Remember that everyone is different, and everyone's numbers will be different depending on the factors below. In order to hit your goals, it is best to be as accurate as possible when selecting the options below.

Age
Height
Weight
Sex
Goal
Activity Level

Can I enter my own workouts?

No. When you register, you select the activity level that best describes your average day. The activity level selected includes the average amount of calories you burn during a typical day. Therefore, if you exercise 30 minutes per day, you do not need to enter the calories you have burnt, as it's already been accounted for.

Our fast and easy survey will allow you to eat all the foods you love AND stay on track with your weight loss journey.

 
TESTIMONIALS
Sabrina started using CalorieWiz after her first pregnancy, where she gained 65 pounds. She could not imagine how she was going to get back to her pre-baby weight, but SHE DID! CalorieWiz was quick and easy for her to use, all she had to do was tell CalorieWiz what she wanted to eat, and it told her how much of each item. Her favourite features are the barcode scanner and Wiz's Picks. 

 
Jennifer has lost 16 pounds using CalorieWiz. She started using CalorieWiz as a way to stay active, lose weight and become a healthier person. It is easy and fun for Jennifer to use on a daily basis. She enjoys that it allows her to eat the foods she loves, without having to cut out sugars or carbs, but rather help her portion them out! 

 
Jane started using CalorieWiz a few months ago and was able to lose 17 pounds. She finds CalorieWiz user friendly and the app helps her control her portions. She is able to eat anything she wants. It's not only for people looking to lose weight, but great for maintaining your weight too! 

 
 

 
HOW CALORIEWIZ WORKS
Search. Select. CalorieWiz will do the rest! 


 
Wiz's Picks: Quick and Easy
 

 

 
 CALORIEWIZ COMPARISON

 
HOW IT ALL STARTED

Mark, creator and co-founder of CalorieWiz, started his weight loss journey 7 years ago, when he weighed 222lbs. He mapped out his weight loss plan, which consisted of 30-40 minutes of exercise 5 times per week and only eating healthy foods. He noticed that his weight loss was minimal, with only 4-5 pounds in the first month.
He soon discovered that it wasn’t the quality of food you put in your body, it’s calories in vs. calories out that achieves your weight loss goals.
Mark decided to count calories and no longer follow a restrictive diet. The results were immediate, within the first 2 weeks, he was able to lose 5 lbs, and in total lost 52 lbs.
He was asked how he lost his weight, and he responded "it’s simple, calories in vs. calories out. Start logging and measuring your foods and you will achieve the same outcome." Many people started but gave up quickly due to complicated databases, not knowing what to eat and the amount of time and effort it takes to plan your day around eating. 
All this led to creating the world's newest and most revolutionary weight loss app, called CalorieWiz, that counts calories for you!

 
 

INDIEGOGO SPECIAL

 
     
     

 

 
 
DEVELOPMENT TIMELINE

 

HELP OUT
BY SHARING WITH FRIENDS
Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend who would benefit from CalorieWiz!We can't do this without  you! THANK YOU! 



 
 
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
How does CalorieWiz work?
CalorieWiz makes losing weight easier by calculating portions for you by using the following steps:

 Select the meal you want to add food to
Search and select foods you want to eat
CalorieWiz will calculate the portions for you
Eat!

Am I able to change my settings after signup? 
Yes!

Tap the menu icon at the top left corner
Select Settings
From here you can change any of the settings from when you signed up

How are calories calculated?
CalorieWiz uses the Harris Benedict Equation to calculate your basal metabolic rate (BMR). Your basal metabolic rate is the amount of calories needed if you were to lay around with no energy expenditure. The Harris Benedict Equation uses your BMR and applies the activity level (energy expenditure) that best describes your lifestyle to determine your daily caloric maintenance level (the amount of calories to consume to maintain your current weight). CalorieWiz uses this to calculate the amount of calories to consume in order to hit your goal! Remember that everyone is different, and everyone's numbers will be different depending on the factors below. In order to hit your goals, it is best to be as accurate as possible when selecting the options below.
AgeHeightWeightSexGoalActivity Level
Can I enter my own workouts?
No. When you register, you select the activity level that best describes your average day. The activity level selected includes the average amount of calories you burn during a typical day. Therefore, if you exercise 30 minutes per day, you do not need to enter the calories you have burnt, as it's already been accounted for.

story:
coMra Wave – converts harmful electro-magnetic radiation into harmonic wave forms that re-energise body and mind.

 


coMra Wave is the Guardian of your HEALTH!

Let our technology benefits you… your family, friends, and loved ones… your employees and business.
Or just experience the JOY of giving someone a gift!
 

  • Refreshes and improves the quality of water.

  • Protection from harmful wireless radiation.

  • Quality and style combined with real function.

  • Maintenance free for a lifetime of protection.

  • No batteries needed.

  • Easy to use.

  • Extremely Affordable.



Why this technology?


My name is Garrett Murrin and I work for Radiant Life Technologies, where we’ve been producing medical devices – like the coMra Delta and the coMra Palm – for over a decade.

After years of research, we came to understand the relationship between harmful electromagnetic radiation, its effect upon the quality of our water, and the negative results of this upon our health. In short, we discovered that healthy water is key to optimal health.

We’ve developed a way to re-generate healthy water, and offer a level of protection against harmful electromagnetic radiation: introducing coMra Wave technology. If you haven’t already, please watch our video above for more detailed information.

 

We need your support NOW

We need US$50,000 to produce an initial batch of three stand-alone products; the coMra Wave Cell – attached to your smart phone, laptop, tablet, etc. for EMF protection; the coMra Wave Pendant – worn close to the body for a 24hr effect; and the coMra Wave Coaster – used to re-generate your drinking water.

 

coMra Wave product line

 

Designed for mobile phone, tablet, laptop – or any device that emits a communications signal – the coMra Wave Cell is a truly unique dual-purpose device. Firstly, it offers a level of protection against harmful electromagnetic radiation; and secondly, it re-energises the water in your body, or any water containing structure within a 13 cm radius.

The outer octagon shell is made from hard-wearing, food-grade matt silicone, with a strong adhesive layer at the back for attaching to your device.

The silicone outer shell contains a Printed Circuit Board with a patented 6-layer system. This system absorbs the harmful electromagnetic radiation, converts it, creates a vortex signature and then imprints that signature of re-energised wave forms back into your body.

 

 

 

The coMra Wave Coaster is in essence a coMra Wave Cell embedded in the same hard-wearing, food-grade matt silicone material. With a surface area large enough for your glass, mug or plastic bottle, it takes less than 10 minutes for the coMra Wave technology to re-energise one litre of your drinking water.

The octagonal surface has an indented spiral-grid pattern, designed for catching condensation and light spills.

The embedded coMra Wave Cell contains a Printed Circuit Board with a multi-layer system of 6. This system absorbs harmful electromagnetic radiation, creates the vortex signature, then imprints re-energised wave forms back into your drink.

 

 

 

Made from luxurious hand-polished zirconium, the coMra Wave Pendant is the pinnacle of the coMra Wave line. A double-sided finish – Black & Pearl White – makes for a unique, unisex impression, designed for everyday wear – on a chain, on a key fob or for anywhere next to the skin – and maximum protection.

The coMra Wave Pendant offers the greatest level of protection, with a multi-layer system of 7. This system absorbs the harmful electromagnetic radiation, transforms it and creates the vortex signature. The additional 7th layer is a quartz crystal interface engineered to accumulate and deliver of the vortex signature back into your body with greater efficiency than a standard coMra Wave Cell.

 

 

Unlock bonus

The more funds we raise the more bonus options we can unlock. For example, every US$15,000 we raise past the US$30,000, mark gives us the required means to offer more colour options. So, please, spread the word and tell your family and friends about us!

 

How does coMra Wave technology work?

Let’s use a coMra Wave Cell and go through an example;


 

Another example using the coMra Wave Coaster;

 

 

How does that multi-layer system work?

 

 

Economical and ecological

coMra Wave technology does not use batteries or have any moving parts. It's completely self-powered using the ambient electromagnetic radiation as its power source. Longevity of the devices depend on physical wear only.

 

The Impact

We know that coMra Wave technology will be of enormous benefit to users, especially in light of the big push toward the deployment of 5G networks around the world – pumping out harmful EMF with further negative consequences to our health.

The Impact

story:
FoodToDo - Making Food Personal

At Foodtodo, we love healthy and tasty food and we see that in the 20th century many of people fight with nutritional diseases such as IBS, lactose intolerance, and diabetes.

So instead of solving one problem, we decided to create a 2 in 1 solution.

In one way it is a platform for the nutrition professionals to manage their practice, in another way it is oriented to people who want to cook healthy meals, consult a nutritionist, or daily track their lifestyle goals.

FoodToDo is our consumer solution, perfect for any health-conscious families and individuals or those suffering diet-related conditions while FoodToDo Pro is our web-based app, tailor-made for nutrition professionals aimed at digitizing their practice, allowing them to connect with and monitor their clients using FoodToDo.

  • Meal Planning for your whole family
  • Nutrient Calculator
  • Recipes and Meal Plans for various health conditions
  • Health Blog
  • Shopping List Integration
  • Restaurant Locator
  • Client Data Management
  • Recipes and Meal Plans for various health conditions
  • Meal Plan Creator
  • IoT Integration
  • Blood Glucose Management
  • Recommendations System
  • Knowledge Hub
  • Connecting you with people in need of nutrition consultancy

About the Founder

My name is Sophie Michelin and I am the Founder of FoodToDo. I am a mother of 5, chef, sommelier and a nutrition expert. The whole story started when my patchwork family came regularly to spend Christmas and Summer time with us and I needed to combine lactose intolerance, strawberry and tomato allergy with my starch free diet. I was hoping there’d be a solution for that. As a chef I looked around and saw that most of the weight loss intents fail and many of my friends suffer from insulin resistance, prediabetes and depression which are mostly caused by unhealthy, high sugar diets.

This is why I created FoodToDo, a solution aimed at both individuals, family members, nutritionists and other diet related professionals as well. Our mission is to abolish diet   related non-communicable diseases that are caused by wrong nutrition: from heart disease to diabetes, obesity and other preventable conditions. At the same time we want to offer an easy solution, connecting you with your online food delivery or with the restaurant nearby.

I always listen to my body what it needs, what is nutritious for me and for my kids. And we would like to implement the same philosophy in FoodToDo. Coaching people to understand their body and redesign their diet, with small steps at the time. The last months we worked to get the diet expert community helping us and we’ve got so many input, support and inspirational emails from nutrition professors such Mikael Fogelholm, from University Helsinki to medical evangelists Dr David Katz from Health Initiatives. We contacted thousands of nutritionists and already feeling and experiencing that the crowd is growing around the same cause.

I believe with your support we can turn back the statistics and eliminate diet related non communicable diseases. I am thankful to each of and single support we can gain by contributing to the campaign or simply spread the world: Let’s food be our medicine!

For Individuals and Families

Final product design subject to change

Our solution is centered around healthy diet recommendations, recipes and meal plans in order for us to stay healthy and manage our existing conditions. As an individual, you will be able to log in and analyze the food you consume; choose from over 4,000 recipes for various health goals and conditions (from diabetes to weight loss, muscle gain, lactose intolerance, etc); receive ready-made meal plans; collect health data from your wearable device and connect with health professionals through our platform.

We help to solve you with your dieting challenges.
  • Weight optimisation
  • Healthy eating
  • Diet related non communicable diseases
  • Allergies, Intolerances
  • Joyful cooking
The answer lies in our evidence-based balanced nutrition.
  • Moderation
  • Diversification
  • Eat 5 times a day
  • Eat 5 times vegetables & fruits a day
  • Healthy Fats
  • Focus on drinking the right way
  • Minimizing sugar
  • Home cooking with Seasonal ingredients

Product Features

Over 4,000 Recipes and 100+ meal plans for *various conditions and health challenges (Jan 31/2018) Upload and Share your own recipes with your friends on all social media platforms (Jan 31/2018) 365 day ‘30 second cooking class with Cordon Bleu chefs. Make cooking easy, fun, and effortless (Jan 31/2018)
Recommended Recipes based on your preferences (e.g. I hate mushrooms, I love broccoli) (Jan 31/2018) Meal planning for your whole family combine your family members’ diet expectations and get your weekly menu plan in a minute (Spring 2018) Health Blog stay up to date with various articles about healthy living for yourself and your family (Jan 31/2018)
Shopping List Integration automatically create shopping lists based on your meal plans that are connected through online food retailers (Fall 2018) Food Consumption Recommendation receive recommendations on what foods to consume in order to reach your daily recommended intake of macro and micro nutrients (Spring 2018) Challenge tracker Big changes come with small steps. After analyzing your dietary needs we help you reach it with fun challenges (Spring 2018)
IoT Integration of various smart devices and wearables that collect health information and translate it into suggestions for your wellbeing (Spring 2018) Lab Results Tracking for yourself or your family. Upload the lab test results (blood work) to track and share with your diet professional (Spring 2018) Blood Glucose Management keep track of your blood glucose level by the foods consumed and health data collected from smart devices (Spring 2018)
Nutritionist Locator/Online Nutrition Consulting find a nutritionist near you or connect online with one for nutritional advice (Spring 2018) Restaurant Locator find a restaurant near you that serves food that is appropriate to your diet type (Fall 2018)

*Heart Disease, High Blood Pressure, Gout, Celiac Disease, Type 1 Diabetes, Type 2 Diabetes, Iron Deficiency, Osteoporosis, Egg Allergy, Nuts Allergy, Milk Allergy, Soy Allergy, Fish Allergy, Shellfish Allergy, Lactose Intolerance, Gluten Intolerance, Preservatives Allergy, and Lifestyle Diets such as Vegan, Vegetarian, Ovo-Lacto Vegetarian, Lacto Vegetarian, Ovo-Vegetarian, Paleolític, Mediterranean, Detox Diet, Blood Type Diets, Weight Loss, Weight Gain, Muscle Gain, Raw, Liquid Diet

FoodToDo Standard Pricing

$17/mo per user

For Diet-Related Professionals

Final product design subject to change

For nutritionists, we’ve created FoodToDo Pro, a digitized solution that allows you to change the way you interact with your clients and assure a modern and effective diet changing process. From client data management to meal planning templates, automatic recommendations, and IoT integration, FoodToDo Pro is an all-round tool to aid you on a daily basis.

Save Valuable Time!
  • Manage your clients' data
  • Create meal plan templates
  • Use thousands of recipes or create your own
  • Calculate your own recipes’ nutrients value
  • Send automated suggestions to your clients based on their health data and progress
  • Communicate with your customers
  • Stay up to date with the latest news, reports and findings in the industry
Generate More Revenue!
  • Connect with people in your area that are in need of nutrition consultancy
  • Offer your services online to people from different locations
  • Increase your efficiency and have more time to see additional clients with a digitized solution
Learn and Promote!
  • Read various articles and publications from certified sources on our Knowledge HUB
  • Receive your mandatory training on our HUB
  • Attend webinars and get informed about upcoming events in your region
  • Get listed on our database and connect with people in need of nutrition consultancy

Product Features

Client Data Management store and track your client’s health through our platform. From current health status to existing conditions, preferred foods and health test results, you can quickly access all your client’s information (Continuous Development) Over 4,000 Recipes for *various conditions and health goals (31st Jan/2018) Upload and Share your own recipes (31st Jan/2018)
Nutrient Calculator for your chosen recipes and the food you consume (31st Jan/2018) Meal Plan Creator create meal plans for your clients using your own or existing recipes and meal plans (31st Jan/2018) Food Frequency questionnaire a digitized set up process to regularly scan your clients diet and lifestyle habits. (Spring 2018)
Appointment System easily manage your appointments (31st Jan/2018) In-App Communication System communicate with your clients or with fellow professionals (31st Jan/2018) IoT Integration to follow up your client's condition 24/7 with their favorite wearable devices (Spring 2018)
Blood Glucose Management keep track of your client's blood glucose level by the foods consumed and view the analyzed data (31st Jan/2018) Statistics analyze and receive automatic reports based on the collected user health data over a specific period of time (Fall 2018) Finance follow up your accounts, track client billing (Fall 2018)
Online Nutrition Consulting offer your services online to customers in your area through the FoodToDo platform (Spring 2018) Knowledge Hub all the most important articles, publications and findings in the health and diet industry gathered from the most reliable sources (professional journals, medical publications, governmental and private institutions, etc). (Spring 2018)

*Heart Disease, High Blood Pressure, Gout, Celiac Disease, Type 1 Diabetes, Type 2 Diabetes, Iron Deficiency, Osteoporosis, Egg Allergy, Nuts Allergy, Milk Allergy, Soy Allergy, Fish Allergy, Shellfish Allergy, Lactose Intolerance, Gluten Intolerance, Preservatives Allergy, and Lifestyle Diets such as Vegan, Vegetarian, Ovo-Lacto Vegetarian, Lacto Vegetarian, Ovo-Vegetarian, Paleolític, Mediterranean, Detox Diet, Blood Type Diets, Weight Loss, Weight Gain, Muscle Gain, Raw, Liquid Diet

The Knowledge HUB

Having an in-house team of nutrition professionals and working with numerous practitioners from around the world has led us to understand that practitioners spend countless hours trying to source relevant information from a wide range of sources to support their daily work. This has inspired us to build a unique platform that will be available to you for free.

We believe that easily accessible information can be the key to improve your knowledge, provide better client service to grow your practice.

Knowledge HUB Features
  • Latest nutrition reports and research from internationally accredited sources
  • Articles and publications related to nutrition
  • Podcasts and webinars from nutrition PhDs and influencers
  • Relevant Nutrition Events
  • Continuous Professional Development modules (accredited compulsory training for nutrition professionals)
  • Business related articles and consulting to help you manage your private practice
  • Community written articles on various topics
  • Nutrition Professional Listings Service (connecting you with people in need of nutrition consultancy)
The Knowledge HUB is expected to launch in Spring/Summer 2018

FoodToDo Pro Standard Pricing

$479/yr

What will we do with the funding?

In order to grow our company and further develop our product we estimated that we would need about $25,000.

The amount will be used to enhance our user experience. You will be our first testers of the enhanced user experience and in the event of not reaching our goal we will invest the amount to improve our UX.

The Impact

Current Statistics

Every 4th person is obese or overweight in the world. With more than 300 million diabetic people worldwide and over 17 million yearly deaths caused by cardiovascular diseases, we believe that our solution can significantly lower the number of non-communicable diseases worldwide by improving people’s diet and teaching them vital information about their macro and micronutrient needs.

Cardiovascular Statistics

  • 17.7 million people die each year from cardiovascular diseases, an estimated 31% of all deaths worldwide
  • Over 75% of CVDs occur in low-income and middle-income families
  • 80% of all CVD deaths are due to heart attacks and strokes
Source: http://www.who.int

Source: Institute of Health Metrics and Evaluation

Our Milestones for 2018 - 2019

Increase our community of diet professionals to over 50,000 members by the end of 2018

By mid-2018 we will collaborate with the biggest organizations fighting against non-communicable diseases

By late-2018 we aim at partnering with the main nutrition associations from the EU, US and Oceania

Assist over 500,000 people in managing their diet-related conditions, health, and body goals by 2019

By 2019 we hope to become a main supplier of nutrition guidance in schools and cafeterias across the world

Continuously improve our solutions with the help of tech companies and health organizations

CSR

The future of our society in the hands of our children.

Working with people from across the world has taught us that an early education about health and food is the key to grow a healthy and responsible society. Because of this, starting from 2018, we have decided to join and establish local programs in the UK, Finland and Hungary to teach children important information about food and how to cook.

Our Partners

As Seen On

Risks & Challenges

As a small but experienced international team we need your help to take us to the next level. For the last few years we’ve been building a solution to change the lives of people worldwide and reduce the number of non-communicable diseases. We do understand that what we aim at doing is not easy but we are up for the challenge.

Other Ways You Can Help

We appreciate any kind of help and spreading the word about our campaign and company is a great way to support us. Please use the campaign share buttons and feel free to contact us if you have any other ideas on how to help us.

In addition to this, we are constantly looking for global partners that can help us localize FoodToDo and integrate region specific foods and recipes.

Our Perks

Join Our Cause!

Help us abolish diet-related diseases, including diabetes, hypertension, cancer, anaemia, and depression. As thanks for helping support our campaign, you'll receive a FoodToDo pin.

$19

FoodToDo - 3 Month Subscription

For Individuals and Families

Receive a 3-month pre-paid subscription to the consumer version of FoodToDo at an Indiegogo-exclusive low price and a FoodToDo pin.

$34.99

FoodToDo - Lifetime Subscription

For Individuals and Families

Receive an Indiegogo-exclusive lifetime pre-paid subscription to the consumer version of FoodToDo and a FoodToDo pin.

$249

FoodToDo Pro Bronze

For Nutrition Professionals
  • 1-year pre-paid subscription to FoodToDo Pro
  • Lifetime access to the Knowledge HUB
  • Bronze-tier listing in our nutrition consultancy database
  • FoodToDo pin

$119

FoodToDo Pro Silver

For Nutrition Professionals
  • 2-year pre-paid subscription to FoodToDo Pro
  • Lifetime access to the Knowledge HUB
  • Silver-tier listing in our nutrition consultancy database
  • 20 free FoodToDo consumer accounts (1-month, prepaid)
  • FoodToDo pin

$349

FoodToDo Pro Gold

For Nutrition Professionals
  • Lifetime pre-paid subscription to FoodToDo Pro
  • Lifetime access to the Knowledge HUB
  • Gold-tier listing in our nutrition consultancy database
  • 50 free FoodToDo consumer accounts (1-month, prepaid)
  • FoodToDo pin

$699

About Our team

Our international team consists of 21 full-time members from Finland, UK, USA, Hungary, Italy, Moldova and Romania. If you are interested in joining our company please check our career page and submit your application http://themealplanner.com/jobs.html.

Sophie Michelin

CEO
“One of my biggest challenges is to organise my time around work and family duties. I love cooking and as a chef, I enjoy spontaneity in my kitchen. Although making 5 meals per day for my family could hinder that. With our platform, my goal was to put structure into days when I just need healthy and quick meals and still be spontaneous when I create recipes for special occasions.”

Daniel Szohatzky

CTO
“Being a technical guy with a cooking sense makes the perfect combination for molecular cooking... Well, not quite. But good ground for experimenting new ways in cooking and giving technical background in developing a project with great opportunities and intention to help sustainable and healthy food (to do).”

Zsofia Rutkai

Product Owner - FoodToDo
“I am a design and project manager with a background in communication. I enjoy supporting product development processes and working together with multidisciplinary teams. Exploring new meals and creating food is my passion. I am a hobby chef and during my life I also could learn the importance of healthy lifestyle and well being which can be part of one's success. I am happy to be part of creating products that inspire people to live a better and more efficient life.”

Ildi Holdampf

Product Owner - FoodToDo PRO
“Although my family is a small one, they like to have fresh food every day and dislike eating the same food for days. After a while, I wasn’t able to change my ”cooking-8-dishes-in-40- minutes” routine because I don’t want to spend the days grocery shopping and cooking: I’d rather spend my free time with my kids. I started to be bored and frustrated with planning and cooking, it became a chore, and was not fun anymore. Being part of the creation of this platform, I gained my creativity back to impress my family with taste.”

Lissa Leader

Nutrition Advisor UK
“I am passionate about making the nutrients in food work for you! I truly believe that good nutrition can help to restore balance in the body by addressing digestive issues and any nutritional imbalances that could be impeding a route to optimum health and vitality. There is wisdom in the saying, We are what we eat!”

Cristian Nechifor

Community Manager/Regional Sales Manager
“Ever since I started my sports career years ago I’ve been an advocate of healthy eating and food analysis. I believe that selling a product in 2017 requires a much more customer-centric approach and it is my passion to communicate and understand the needs of the people we work with. I invest my free time coaching American Football and cooking delicious meals for my significant other.”

FAQ

What is FoodToDo and FoodToDoPro?

FoodToDo is a consumer app aimed at individuals that wish to have a healthy diet or manage their existing diet-related conditions. With over 4,000 recipes, meal plans and a multitude of useful health features, FoodToDo is an ideal tool for every person regardless of age, gender, health status or goal.

FoodToDo Pro is the version built for Diet-Professionals that aims at changing the way they interact with clients. We aim at empowering dietitians and nutritionists with a software solution that will make their job easier, more efficient and allow them to have a greater impact on the public health.

Is FoodToDo right for me?

We believe so! We’ve built our solution to match every person that wants to improve their nutrition. Whether you’re trying to manage your condition, lose weight, gain muscle or simply improve your nutrition, FoodToDo is right for you. Check down below for the list of diet types that we currently cover.

Do you work with dietitians and nutritionists?

Yes, FoodToDo and FoodToDo Pro have been build together with diet-professionals from around the world in order to cater the needs and specifications of their profession and their clients. Our success directly depends their work and therefore our community of dietitians and nutritionists is our most valuable asset.

I’m a dietitian/nutritionist, should I use FoodToDo Pro?

We would love to have you as a part of our community. Based on numerous pilots that we’ve conducted, FoodToDo Pro is the most useful and complete solution available for diet-professionals. We are constantly adding new features to the software based on your feedback and needs.

Are you trying to make trips to nutritionists/dietitians redundant?

No, we believe that face-to-face nutrition consultancies are the most efficient. We would like to envisage a future without diet-related diseases, hence, our mission is to educate the public about good nutrition and how seeking advice from qualified professionals can help them achieve optimal health.

Our app is meant to be used on a daily basis by diet-professionals and their clients.

Does FoodToDo Pro contain any learning materials for professionals?

Yes, we are building a Knowledge HUB where you will be able to find learning materials from accredited sources, webinars, reports and relevant nutrition and health related events from around the world.

Do you cater to all diet types (vegan, pescatarian, gluten-free, etc)?

Yes, we will cater to all diet types. Here is a list of all the current diets (the list will be continuously updated):

  • Diets for the following conditions: Heart Disease, High Blood Pressure, Gout, Celiac Disease, Type 1 Diabetes, Type 2 Diabetes, Iron Deficiency, Osteoporosis, Nuts Allergy, Lactose Intolerance, Milk Allergy, Soy Allergy, Fish Allergy, Shellfish Allergy, Gluten Intolerance, Preservatives Allergy.
  • Diets rich in Antioxidants, Folate, Iron, Calcium, Magnesium, Protein, Fiber, Vitamin C, Vitamin D.
  • Diets low in Sodium, Sugar, Fat, Starch.
  • Diets free from Lactose, Milk, Seafood, Preservatives, Egg, Gluten, Nuts, Shellfish and Scallop, Soy.
  • Lifestyle diets: Vegan, Vegetarian, Ovo-Lacto Vegetarian, Lacto Vegetarian, Ovo-Vegetarian, Paleolithic, Mediterranean, Detox Diet, Blood Type Diets, Weight Loss, Weight Gain, Muscle Gain, Raw, Liquid Diet.

Can I manage conditions such as diabetes and high-blood pressure with my diet?

Yes, diet-related conditions such as diabetes and high-blood pressure can be managed with adequate dieting. It is important to discuss about this with a trained professional first.

Can I lose weight/gain muscle by using it?

Definitely, FoodToDo is great for people who do sports or just want to lose weight.

Can I log my blood glucose levels?

Yes, in the first version of the software you will be able to log in your blood glucose manually. In the near future we will have an automatic system that will work with all the wireless blood glucose meters and wearable devices.

What if I don’t suffer from any allergies or illnesses?

Even if you don’t suffer from any diet-related illnesses or allergies, FoodToDo can be a great tool to make sure that you’re eating the right foods and reaching your daily recommended values of macro and micronutrients.

Can I share my health data (ECG/blood glucose/activity) with my dietitian/nutritionist?

Yes, FoodToDo users can, if they wish, share their health data with their diet-professionals.

Is my personal information and health data secure?

It is extremely important to us that our user information and health data is in safe hands. This is why we’ve invested a big chunk of our resources into secure servers and data management systems. All the sharable personal information and health data require your authorization before being shared with your diet-professional.
story_txt:
FoodToDo - Making Food Personal
At Foodtodo, we love healthy and tasty food and we see that in the 20th century many of people fight with nutritional diseases such as IBS, lactose intolerance, and diabetes.
So instead of solving one problem, we decided to create a 2 in 1 solution.
In one way it is a platform for the nutrition professionals to manage their practice, in another way it is oriented to people who want to cook healthy meals, consult a nutritionist, or daily track their lifestyle goals.
FoodToDo is our consumer solution, perfect for any health-conscious families and individuals or those suffering diet-related conditions while FoodToDo Pro is our web-based app, tailor-made for nutrition professionals aimed at digitizing their practice, allowing them to connect with and monitor their clients using FoodToDo. 

Meal Planning for your whole family
Nutrient Calculator
Recipes and Meal Plans for various health conditions
Health Blog
Shopping List Integration
Restaurant Locator




Client Data Management
Recipes and Meal Plans for various health conditions
Meal Plan Creator
IoT Integration
Blood Glucose Management
Recommendations System
Knowledge Hub
Connecting you with people in need of nutrition consultancy



About the Founder
My name is Sophie Michelin and I am the Founder of FoodToDo. I am a mother of 5, chef, sommelier and a nutrition expert. The whole story started when my patchwork family came regularly to spend Christmas and Summer time with us and I needed to combine lactose intolerance, strawberry and tomato allergy with my starch free diet. I was hoping there’d be a solution for that. As a chef I looked around and saw that most of the weight loss intents fail and many of my friends suffer from insulin resistance, prediabetes and depression which are mostly caused by unhealthy, high sugar diets.
This is why I created FoodToDo, a solution aimed at both individuals, family members, nutritionists and other diet related professionals as well. Our mission is to abolish diet   related non-communicable diseases that are caused by wrong nutrition: from heart disease to diabetes, obesity and other preventable conditions. At the same time we want to offer an easy solution, connecting you with your online food delivery or with the restaurant nearby.
I always listen to my body what it needs, what is nutritious for me and for my kids. And we would like to implement the same philosophy in FoodToDo. Coaching people to understand their body and redesign their diet, with small steps at the time. The last months we worked to get the diet expert community helping us and we’ve got so many input, support and inspirational emails from nutrition professors such Mikael Fogelholm, from University Helsinki to medical evangelists Dr David Katz from Health Initiatives. We contacted thousands of nutritionists and already feeling and experiencing that the crowd is growing around the same cause.
I believe with your support we can turn back the statistics and eliminate diet related non communicable diseases. I am thankful to each of and single support we can gain by contributing to the campaign or simply spread the world: Let’s food be our medicine!

For Individuals and Families Final product design subject to change
Our solution is centered around healthy diet recommendations, recipes and meal plans in order for us to stay healthy and manage our existing conditions. As an individual, you will be able to log in and analyze the food you consume; choose from over 4,000 recipes for various health goals and conditions (from diabetes to weight loss, muscle gain, lactose intolerance, etc); receive ready-made meal plans; collect health data from your wearable device and connect with health professionals through our platform.

We help to solve you with your dieting challenges.
Weight optimisation
Healthy eating
Diet related non communicable diseases
Allergies, Intolerances
Joyful cooking
 The answer lies in our evidence-based balanced nutrition.
Moderation
Diversification
Eat 5 times a day
Eat 5 times vegetables & fruits a day
Healthy Fats
Focus on drinking the right way
Minimizing sugar
Home cooking with Seasonal ingredients



Product Features

 Over 4,000 Recipes and 100+ meal plans for *various conditions and health challenges (Jan 31/2018)    Upload and Share your own recipes with your friends on all social media platforms (Jan 31/2018)    365 day ‘30 second cooking class with Cordon Bleu chefs. Make cooking easy, fun, and effortless (Jan 31/2018) 


 Recommended Recipes based on your preferences (e.g. I hate mushrooms, I love broccoli) (Jan 31/2018)    Meal planning for your whole family combine your family members’ diet expectations and get your weekly menu plan in a minute (Spring 2018)    Health Blog stay up to date with various articles about healthy living for yourself and your family (Jan 31/2018) 


 Shopping List Integration automatically create shopping lists based on your meal plans that are connected through online food retailers (Fall 2018)    Food Consumption Recommendation receive recommendations on what foods to consume in order to reach your daily recommended intake of macro and micro nutrients (Spring 2018)    Challenge tracker Big changes come with small steps. After analyzing your dietary needs we help you reach it with fun challenges (Spring 2018) 


 IoT Integration of various smart devices and wearables that collect health information and translate it into suggestions for your wellbeing (Spring 2018)    Lab Results Tracking for yourself or your family. Upload the lab test results (blood work) to track and share with your diet professional (Spring 2018)    Blood Glucose Management keep track of your blood glucose level by the foods consumed and health data collected from smart devices (Spring 2018) 


 Nutritionist Locator/Online Nutrition Consulting find a nutritionist near you or connect online with one for nutritional advice (Spring 2018)    Restaurant Locator find a restaurant near you that serves food that is appropriate to your diet type (Fall 2018) 

*Heart Disease, High Blood Pressure, Gout, Celiac Disease, Type 1 Diabetes, Type 2 Diabetes, Iron Deficiency, Osteoporosis, Egg Allergy, Nuts Allergy, Milk Allergy, Soy Allergy, Fish Allergy, Shellfish Allergy, Lactose Intolerance, Gluten Intolerance, Preservatives Allergy, and Lifestyle Diets such as Vegan, Vegetarian, Ovo-Lacto Vegetarian, Lacto Vegetarian, Ovo-Vegetarian, Paleolític, Mediterranean, Detox Diet, Blood Type Diets, Weight Loss, Weight Gain, Muscle Gain, Raw, Liquid Diet 


FoodToDo Standard Pricing
$17/mo per user


For Diet-Related Professionals Final product design subject to change
For nutritionists, we’ve created FoodToDo Pro, a digitized solution that allows you to change the way you interact with your clients and assure a modern and effective diet changing process. From client data management to meal planning templates, automatic recommendations, and IoT integration, FoodToDo Pro is an all-round tool to aid you on a daily basis.

Save Valuable Time!
Manage your clients' data
Create meal plan templates
Use thousands of recipes or create your own
Calculate your own recipes’ nutrients value
Send automated suggestions to your clients based on their health data and progress
Communicate with your customers
Stay up to date with the latest news, reports and findings in the industry
 Generate More Revenue!
Connect with people in your area that are in need of nutrition consultancy
Offer your services online to people from different locations
Increase your efficiency and have more time to see additional clients with a digitized solution
 Learn and Promote!
Read various articles and publications from certified sources on our Knowledge HUB
Receive your mandatory training on our HUB
Attend webinars and get informed about upcoming events in your region
Get listed on our database and connect with people in need of nutrition consultancy



Product Features

 Client Data Management store and track your client’s health through our platform. From current health status to existing conditions, preferred foods and health test results, you can quickly access all your client’s information (Continuous Development)    Over 4,000 Recipes for *various conditions and health goals (31st Jan/2018)    Upload and Share your own recipes (31st Jan/2018) 


 Nutrient Calculator for your chosen recipes and the food you consume (31st Jan/2018)    Meal Plan Creator create meal plans for your clients using your own or existing recipes and meal plans (31st Jan/2018)    Food Frequency questionnaire a digitized set up process to regularly scan your clients diet and lifestyle habits. (Spring 2018) 


 Appointment System easily manage your appointments (31st Jan/2018)    In-App Communication System communicate with your clients or with fellow professionals (31st Jan/2018)    IoT Integration to follow up your client's condition 24/7 with their favorite wearable devices (Spring 2018) 


 Blood Glucose Management keep track of your client's blood glucose level by the foods consumed and view the analyzed data (31st Jan/2018)    Statistics analyze and receive automatic reports based on the collected user health data over a specific period of time (Fall 2018)    Finance follow up your accounts, track client billing (Fall 2018) 


 Online Nutrition Consulting offer your services online to customers in your area through the FoodToDo platform (Spring 2018)    Knowledge Hub all the most important articles, publications and findings in the health and diet industry gathered from the most reliable sources (professional journals, medical publications, governmental and private institutions, etc). (Spring 2018) 

*Heart Disease, High Blood Pressure, Gout, Celiac Disease, Type 1 Diabetes, Type 2 Diabetes, Iron Deficiency, Osteoporosis, Egg Allergy, Nuts Allergy, Milk Allergy, Soy Allergy, Fish Allergy, Shellfish Allergy, Lactose Intolerance, Gluten Intolerance, Preservatives Allergy, and Lifestyle Diets such as Vegan, Vegetarian, Ovo-Lacto Vegetarian, Lacto Vegetarian, Ovo-Vegetarian, Paleolític, Mediterranean, Detox Diet, Blood Type Diets, Weight Loss, Weight Gain, Muscle Gain, Raw, Liquid Diet 


The Knowledge HUB
Having an in-house team of nutrition professionals and working with numerous practitioners from around the world has led us to understand that practitioners spend countless hours trying to source relevant information from a wide range of sources to support their daily work. This has inspired us to build a unique platform that will be available to you for free.
We believe that easily accessible information can be the key to improve your knowledge, provide better client service to grow your practice.
Knowledge HUB Features
Latest nutrition reports and research from internationally accredited sources
Articles and publications related to nutrition
Podcasts and webinars from nutrition PhDs and influencers
Relevant Nutrition Events
Continuous Professional Development modules (accredited compulsory training for nutrition professionals)
Business related articles and consulting to help you manage your private practice
Community written articles on various topics
Nutrition Professional Listings Service (connecting you with people in need of nutrition consultancy)
 The Knowledge HUB is expected to launch in Spring/Summer 2018


FoodToDo Pro Standard Pricing
$479/yr


What will we do with the funding?
In order to grow our company and further develop our product we estimated that we would need about $25,000.
The amount will be used to enhance our user experience. You will be our first testers of the enhanced user experience and in the event of not reaching our goal we will invest the amount to improve our UX.

The Impact
Current Statistics
Every 4th person is obese or overweight in the world. With more than 300 million diabetic people worldwide and over 17 million yearly deaths caused by cardiovascular diseases, we believe that our solution can significantly lower the number of non-communicable diseases worldwide by improving people’s diet and teaching them vital information about their macro and micronutrient needs.
  Cardiovascular Statistics 

17.7 million people die each year from cardiovascular diseases, an estimated 31% of all deaths worldwide
Over 75% of CVDs occur in low-income and middle-income families
80% of all CVD deaths are due to heart attacks and strokes

Source: http://www.who.int
 Source: Institute of Health Metrics and Evaluation

Our Milestones for 2018 - 2019

Increase our community of diet professionals to over 50,000 members by the end of 2018


By mid-2018 we will collaborate with the biggest organizations fighting against non-communicable diseases


By late-2018 we aim at partnering with the main nutrition associations from the EU, US and Oceania


Assist over 500,000 people in managing their diet-related conditions, health, and body goals by 2019


By 2019 we hope to become a main supplier of nutrition guidance in schools and cafeterias across the world


Continuously improve our solutions with the help of tech companies and health organizations


CSR
The future of our society in the hands of our children.
Working with people from across the world has taught us that an early education about health and food is the key to grow a healthy and responsible society. Because of this, starting from 2018, we have decided to join and establish local programs in the UK, Finland and Hungary to teach children important information about food and how to cook.


Our Partners




As Seen On






Risks & Challenges
As a small but experienced international team we need your help to take us to the next level. For the last few years we’ve been building a solution to change the lives of people worldwide and reduce the number of non-communicable diseases. We do understand that what we aim at doing is not easy but we are up for the challenge.
Other Ways You Can Help
We appreciate any kind of help and spreading the word about our campaign and company is a great way to support us. Please use the campaign share buttons and feel free to contact us if you have any other ideas on how to help us.
In addition to this, we are constantly looking for global partners that can help us localize FoodToDo and integrate region specific foods and recipes.

Our Perks


Join Our Cause!
Help us abolish diet-related diseases, including diabetes, hypertension, cancer, anaemia, and depression. As thanks for helping support our campaign, you'll receive a FoodToDo pin.
$19




FoodToDo - 3 Month Subscription
For Individuals and FamiliesReceive a 3-month pre-paid subscription to the consumer version of FoodToDo at an Indiegogo-exclusive low price and a FoodToDo pin.
$34.99




FoodToDo - Lifetime Subscription

$249

For Nutrition Professionals

Lifetime access to the Knowledge HUB
Bronze-tier listing in our nutrition consultancy database
FoodToDo pin

For Nutrition Professionals
2-year pre-paid subscription to FoodToDo Pro
Lifetime access to the Knowledge HUB
Silver-tier listing in our nutrition consultancy database
20 free FoodToDo consumer accounts (1-month, prepaid)
FoodToDo pin

$349




FoodToDo Pro Gold
For Nutrition Professionals
Lifetime pre-paid subscription to FoodToDo Pro
Lifetime access to the Knowledge HUB
Gold-tier listing in our nutrition consultancy database
50 free FoodToDo consumer accounts (1-month, prepaid)
FoodToDo pin

$699



About Our team
Our international team consists of 21 full-time members from Finland, UK, USA, Hungary, Italy, Moldova and Romania. If you are interested in joining our company please check our career page and submit your application http://themealplanner.com/jobs.html.

Sophie Michelin CEO“One of my biggest challenges is to organise my time around work and family duties. I love cooking and as a chef, I enjoy spontaneity in my kitchen. Although making 5 meals per day for my family could hinder that. With our platform, my goal was to put structure into days when I just need healthy and quick meals and still be spontaneous when I create recipes for special occasions.”


Daniel Szohatzky CTO“Being a technical guy with a cooking sense makes the perfect combination for molecular cooking... Well, not quite. But good ground for experimenting new ways in cooking and giving technical background in developing a project with great opportunities and intention to help sustainable and healthy food (to do).”


Zsofia Rutkai Product Owner - FoodToDo“I am a design and project manager with a background in communication. I enjoy supporting product development processes and working together with multidisciplinary teams. Exploring new meals and creating food is my passion. I am a hobby chef and during my life I also could learn the importance of healthy lifestyle and well being which can be part of one's success. I am happy to be part of creating products that inspire people to live a better and more efficient life.”


Ildi Holdampf Product Owner - FoodToDo PRO“Although my family is a small one, they like to have fresh food every day and dislike eating the same food for days. After a while, I wasn’t able to change my ”cooking-8-dishes-in-40- minutes” routine because I don’t want to spend the days grocery shopping and cooking: I’d rather spend my free time with my kids. I started to be bored and frustrated with planning and cooking, it became a chore, and was not fun anymore. Being part of the creation of this platform, I gained my creativity back to impress my family with taste.”


Lissa Leader Nutrition Advisor UK“I am passionate about making the nutrients in food work for you! I truly believe that good nutrition can help to restore balance in the body by addressing digestive issues and any nutritional imbalances that could be impeding a route to optimum health and vitality. There is wisdom in the saying, We are what we eat!”


Cristian Nechifor Community Manager/Regional Sales Manager“Ever since I started my sports career years ago I’ve been an advocate of healthy eating and food analysis. I believe that selling a product in 2017 requires a much more customer-centric approach and it is my passion to communicate and understand the needs of the people we work with. I invest my free time coaching American Football and cooking delicious meals for my significant other.”


FAQ
What is FoodToDo and FoodToDoPro?
FoodToDo is a consumer app aimed at individuals that wish to have a healthy diet or manage their existing diet-related conditions. With over 4,000 recipes, meal plans and a multitude of useful health features, FoodToDo is an ideal tool for every person regardless of age, gender, health status or goal.
FoodToDo Pro is the version built for Diet-Professionals that aims at changing the way they interact with clients. We aim at empowering dietitians and nutritionists with a software solution that will make their job easier, more efficient and allow them to have a greater impact on the public health.
Is FoodToDo right for me?
We believe so! We’ve built our solution to match every person that wants to improve their nutrition. Whether you’re trying to manage your condition, lose weight, gain muscle or simply improve your nutrition, FoodToDo is right for you. Check down below for the list of diet types that we currently cover.
Do you work with dietitians and nutritionists?
Yes, FoodToDo and FoodToDo Pro have been build together with diet-professionals from around the world in order to cater the needs and specifications of their profession and their clients. Our success directly depends their work and therefore our community of dietitians and nutritionists is our most valuable asset.
I’m a dietitian/nutritionist, should I use FoodToDo Pro?
We would love to have you as a part of our community. Based on numerous pilots that we’ve conducted, FoodToDo Pro is the most useful and complete solution available for diet-professionals. We are constantly adding new features to the software based on your feedback and needs.
Are you trying to make trips to nutritionists/dietitians redundant?
No, we believe that face-to-face nutrition consultancies are the most efficient. We would like to envisage a future without diet-related diseases, hence, our mission is to educate the public about good nutrition and how seeking advice from qualified professionals can help them achieve optimal health.
Our app is meant to be used on a daily basis by diet-professionals and their clients.
Does FoodToDo Pro contain any learning materials for professionals?
Yes, we are building a Knowledge HUB where you will be able to find learning materials from accredited sources, webinars, reports and relevant nutrition and health related events from around the world.
Do you cater to all diet types (vegan, pescatarian, gluten-free, etc)?
Yes, we will cater to all diet types. Here is a list of all the current diets (the list will be continuously updated):

Diets for the following conditions: Heart Disease, High Blood Pressure, Gout, Celiac Disease, Type 1 Diabetes, Type 2 Diabetes, Iron Deficiency, Osteoporosis, Nuts Allergy, Lactose Intolerance, Milk Allergy, Soy Allergy, Fish Allergy, Shellfish Allergy, Gluten Intolerance, Preservatives Allergy.
Diets rich in Antioxidants, Folate, Iron, Calcium, Magnesium, Protein, Fiber, Vitamin C, Vitamin D.
Diets low in Sodium, Sugar, Fat, Starch.
Diets free from Lactose, Milk, Seafood, Preservatives, Egg, Gluten, Nuts, Shellfish and Scallop, Soy.
Lifestyle diets: Vegan, Vegetarian, Ovo-Lacto Vegetarian, Lacto Vegetarian, Ovo-Vegetarian, Paleolithic, Mediterranean, Detox Diet, Blood Type Diets, Weight Loss, Weight Gain, Muscle Gain, Raw, Liquid Diet.

Can I manage conditions such as diabetes and high-blood pressure with my diet?
Yes, diet-related conditions such as diabetes and high-blood pressure can be managed with adequate dieting. It is important to discuss about this with a trained professional first.
Can I lose weight/gain muscle by using it?
Definitely, FoodToDo is great for people who do sports or just want to lose weight.
Can I log my blood glucose levels?
Yes, in the first version of the software you will be able to log in your blood glucose manually. In the near future we will have an automatic system that will work with all the wireless blood glucose meters and wearable devices.
What if I don’t suffer from any allergies or illnesses?
Even if you don’t suffer from any diet-related illnesses or allergies, FoodToDo can be a great tool to make sure that you’re eating the right foods and reaching your daily recommended values of macro and micronutrients.
Can I share my health data (ECG/blood glucose/activity) with my dietitian/nutritionist?
Yes, FoodToDo users can, if they wish, share their health data with their diet-professionals.
Is my personal information and health data secure?
It is extremely important to us that our user information and health data is in safe hands. This is why we’ve invested a big chunk of our resources into secure servers and data management systems. All the sharable personal information and health data require your authorization before being shared with your diet-professional.

story:
Help Save Mom's House

My Mom, Gayne Preller Schmidt, is a humble woman that would give you the shirt off her back if she thought it would help you... Unfortunately, the time and energy she has donated has not helped her bank account (Mom has donated funds to many causes / fundraisers for local and state organizations)... She has never asked for anyones help in the past, but I'm asking, on her behalf, because I've seen and worked side by side with her for many years...

  • Mom, Gayne, was born in Denmark, AR in 1933. She has always had a passion for family, historical landmarks, history and wildlife/environment. She, of course, receives her Social Security Check, still works part time as an instructor in a computer lab for Crowley's Ridge Vo-Tech, and has an alterations shop which took in about $2,700 in 2011. Her utilities and telephone cost was much more than what she made (but she loves to sew, and it keeps her active). In addition to those two jobs, she is very active in civic affairs; Chamber of Commerce, Augusta Improvement Club, American Legion Auxiliary, United Methodist Women (local), Augusta Business and Professional Women, and White River Conservancy (which she organized)--all of which she is past President (except ABPW--Secretary) most of which she was in office several years, and in addition still holds offices in the organizations. She is on the Executive Board of Arkansas Wildlife Federation and represented Arkansas several years (until last year) in D.C. with the National Wildlife Federation. I offer the above information to support a "most worthy" designation. Her need is for major repairs to her home (108 years old, and eligible for the National Register) for which she has no funds to make it safe. We (my sisters and I) are unable to help her because of our own circumstances. Mom has owned the house since 1974. No repairs have been done on the house since 2003 when her husband died, except for the new roof that was never finished and improperly installed (which needs repair also)--the roofer put the correct color shingles on the back 3/4th of the house and a bright green on the front---he never finished the install when the mistake was mentioned and has never answered calls since... She is still active in the organizations, and is always doing something for others--never expecting anything in return. She bakes bread every week for the ill, shut-ins, bereaved---even supplies Communion Bread for our church. She has been recognized by the Business and Professional Women's local club as "Woman of the Year" and received the 2009 Augusta Industrial Development Corp "Outstanding Service Award" presented by Dr. Steve Collier with the Governor of Arkansas present. She still does daily watering and weeding, usually alone, at the two parks in downtown Augusta, AR, as chair of the parks committee. However, as deserving and grateful for the recognition, none of this has brought her any funds, and as tirelessly giving and faithful to the organizations to which she belongs, and to the church and community, we would be so pleased to see her receive some help to make her house safe and more like a home. She is embarrassed to invite friends / even family over (even for coffee) because of the risk anyone takes just crossing the porch (that stands 5 feet off the ground supported by the orginal brick columns), and that really hurts us because she was always an "open house", warm and generous hostess...
  • The entire house is in need of repair, but the front and back porches are the most pressing... I thought it best to ask for help funding the repairs the home is in most urgently needed... Various family members have fallen through the deteriorating front porch floor boards, but luckily my 79 year old Mother has not!!! The goal amount is the lowest of three estimates that Gayne has gotten for repairs...
  • We know her dream was to always turn her home into a Bed and Breakfast Heritage Inn just a block away from the White River (which would be a perfect place for anyone that wishes to visit this hunting and fishing paradise) ...We would love to eventually make this dream a reality, and with your (and the rest of the world's) help---I believe it will be a reality sooner than my Mom's dreams!!!

Safety for visitors of Mom

  • The goal of $16,000 is just to cover the restoration of the front and back porches (the front porch is in the video and the back porch has completely fallen off of the house---making the two back doors unuseable)...
  • Any additional funds over the $16,000 goal will go toward hiring another roofer to finish and repair the first roofers shoddy work, repair to the plaster of the ceilings and walls throughtout the house and repainting them, hanging sheetrock upstairs to finish the four bedrooms, and upgrade the heating and air conditioning system.
  • If the goal of $16,000 is not reached the funds that are collected will be used to repair the porches to the best of the contractors abilities...

The History of the House

According to Arkansas Historical Preservation Group there are similar homes thoughout the state, but none that have the ornate architectural features that Mom's house has...

  • The house was built in 1904 by the Eldridge family; they sold it to the Cain family in 1908, and the Cain's lived there until Mom and Dad bought the house in 1974... History tells us that the Eldridge family had the home built, William R. Cain was a County, Municipal, and District Judge and also Justice of the Peace, and Mom has owned several small businesses in town since her and Dad's move from Memphis, TN in 1974 (to be closer to her elderly Mother, Ollie Preller, now deceased) 
  • It is important to the the town's history to restore this house because many of the homes of this age have either been condemned and torn down or have burned.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand and associate with the fact that not everyone can help monetarily, but we urge you to help us "get the word out" for the preservation on this once magnificent landmark historical home...

  • Please share the two following youtube video links with anyone you think might help my Mom...
  • http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BfQB0SodMWs
  • http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4vEMpdOW-SQ

Thank you so much for listening (reading) and getting to know my Mother, Gayne Preller Schmidt. We welcome any assistance...God Bless
